Title: Principal Autonomous Compute GTM Specialist, Asia Pacific
Description:
The right person will be technical and analytical, and possess a min. of 8-10 years selling technical computing solutions, either in direct sales, professional services or enterprise selling/outsourcing, or managed technology services; preferably for cloud or hosted services.
Solid enterprise negotiation skills, and business and financial acumen.
Strong analytical skills, and demonstrated ability to turn detailed data analysis into useful strategic insight in order to drive customer adoption and make appropriate recommendations to the business.
Strong verbal and written communications skills are a must, as well as leadership skills.
Demonstrated ability to work effectively across internal and external organizations is key.

Are you passionate about the Autonomous World, Machine Learning, developing technology strategy and taking it to large-scale production? Are you passionate about engaging the AI community (AI researchers, developers building AI products, roboticists making robots that work, data scientists, and innovative entrepreneurs in hot startups and large enterprises)?

Artificial Intelligence (AI) and everything autonomous have the potential to transform our society and community for generations. Impacting transportation, mobility, telecommunication, energy, healthcare and insurance, rescue and emergency response, hospitality. Achieving this requires implementing one of the most complex computing systems to-date at unprecedented scale. AWS Autonomous Compute is taking a fresh approach with providing an end-to-end, scalable cloud environment that simplifies the development, scaling and production deployment of AI technology. Including a global cloud footprint, infinitely scalable cloud storage, advanced networking and security, state-of-the-art AI platforms and services, rigorous engineering, and a team with the longest experience building cloud technologies.

The AWS Autonomous Computing team is seeking a Senior Business Development for our Autonomous Vehicles Computing business. In this role, you and your team will be responsible for defining, building and deploying effective and targeted strategy to accelerate broad business development activities.

You will define the go to market strategy (GTM) for the AWS Autonomous Computing business, and lead the team to execute that vision. The team defines and drives the process that the organization follows to accelerate sales and partner engagements for AV and autonomous computing deployments. Your work will directly help our customers reinvent their own business models by harnessing the power of AWS’ storage, networking, big data, machine learning, and IoT technologies.

You will facilitate the enablement of customers, sales and solution architects with specific customer centric value proposition about end-to-end Autonomous Vehicles technologies – data ingestion, ML-driven data processing, localization and mapping, AV scenarios simulation and testing, models deployment – on the AWS cloud. You will directly interface with the AWS product and software development teams regarding customer and partner requirements. You will work closely across multiple internal and external organizations – AWS product engineering, business development, sales, marketing, partners, and machine learning communities – to position the AWS platform for customers and partners; and provide guidance on the value proposition and benefit those customers and partners.

In addition, you will develop a standard market intelligence framework drive an amazing team that synthesizes data and information gathered from engaging customers into succinct findings, derive strategic insights. These findings and perspectives will be persuasively communicated to the product and sales teams, including senior leadership. You will work with other AWS business development, sales and solution architecture teams to track, prioritize and close customer engagements that would benefit from the AWS EC2 Compute, EC2 Networking, Storage, ML/DL services, CI/CD services; and collaborate/coordinate cross-functional teams around these engagements when appropriate.

The ideal candidate will possess Business background with strong technology exposure that enable them to drive an engagement and interact at the highest levels of innovative startups and large Enterprises. The candidate will have the technical depth and business experience to easily communicate the benefits of compute, storage, advanced networking, and machine learning platforms and frameworks in the AWS cloud to IT architects, engineering teams, and C-Level executives. The ideal candidate will have a demonstrated ability to think strategically and long-term about the needs of complex global businesses. The ideal candidate will also be deeply familiar with complex legacy IT environments, managed enterprise IT infrastructure services, Enterprise applications, and would have done market analysis, deal negotiation and construction, business operations in these domains. The candidate will have experience managing high performance teams, ideally across virtual or geographical disperse teams.

About AWS

Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the pioneer and recognized leader in Cloud Computing. Our web services provide a platform for IT infrastructure in-the-cloud that is used by hundreds of thousands of developers and businesses around the world. These customers range from start-ups to leading web companies to Global 2000 companies in financial services, pharmaceuticals, and technology. AWS customers are looking for ways to transform their businesses and solve their own complex business challenges with technologies in the cloud. AWS is leading the way in providing customers with powerful, end-to-end platforms and services to solve complex problems.

Roles & Responsibilities:
Engages in senior level customer meetings to discuss customer’s business issues and explores how the AWS can help address and resolve these issues.
Serve as an evangelist for Autonomous Computing on AWS, within AWS and externally.
Define, build and deploy hot startups and enterprise focused sales and business development campaigns around deploying successful autonomous vehicles technology on AWS.
Engage, support and scale business development and sales teams across AWS to be capable of delivering the AWS AV value proposition to customers and partners.
Exhibit Cloud platforms expertise, and experience handling and scaling technology campaigns.
Exhibit expertise in driving AWS field and partner readiness for customers.
Develop a standard market intelligence framework and dynamic analytic model to be utilized by the AWS Sales, Business Development and Marketing teams.
Bring the various stakeholders together to help build collective mindshare in augmenting the AWS AV architectures.
Establish ways to measure and track metrics related to adoption of the AWS for Autonomous Compute and to make improvements to the approach based on those measurements.
Prepare and give business reviews to the senior management team regarding progress and metrics.

Experience selling/developing business relationships in the DL/ML/AI space, Autonomous Vehicles, Technical computing solutions arena.
Experience speaking at technology conferences, driving strategic regional/global initiatives, negotiating large complex IT projects/contracts.
10+ years of business development, enterprise sales, strategic partnerships, or program/product management experience.
Experience selling to Fortune 1000 and/or Global 2000 organizations.
Experience with cloud computing and or related fields (IT, software, etc).
Continued or advanced learning (Master, MBA)

Title: Digital Architect
Description:
This is a strategic role focussing on Application Architecture for multiple digital channels and platforms.
Key Responsibilities and Results:
Understands business functions and transform requirements into architecture and blueprint for the solution being created. Need to propose new innovative solutions, updates to existing solutions, negotiate alternative options, build technical and release roadmaps.
Construct a solution architecture around Microservices and APIs and be able to decompose monolith applications into meaningful implementable Microservices and APIs in a Cloud/DevOps environment.
Work closely with the development team and get their buy-in into accepting the design to be implemented. Also, work with different stake holders, product owner, senior executives, external parties like system integrators, product partners.
Provide technology perspective to business to achieve roadmap and prioritization by keeping abreast with industry trends. Where required, help business size the complexity of problem and help simplify and define MVP.
Qualifications / Experience / Knowledge Required:
Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Engineering or its equivalent.
12+ years of experience in the technology industry including 8+ in architecture of scalable and high-performance internet facing systems.
Possess strong background and experience as a successful Software engineer/Architect in building large scale, highly available Internet and mobile applications.
Have in depth knowledge of cloud computing, microservices architecture (incl. design pattern, rest/grpc, gateway & service mesh etc.), DevOps, streaming architecture, modern data architecture, Mobile and Web application architecture.
Good experience in API security including OAuth2/OIDC, Tokens, mTLS etc.
Significant experience working on mission critical internet facing applications focusing on scalability, performance, architecture aspects.
Passion for architecture and ability to pick up and learn new technological advances very quickly.
Exhibits leadership in guiding team members, adapts to changes in technology and business domains, has good knowledge of latest trends in the market and is well respected within the team.
Solid understanding of Public Cloud (pref. AWS) architecture. AWS certification is a big plus.
Experience in Java, Spring boot, any modern messaging technology, any Traditional and NoSQL database is a big plus.
Ability to effectively communicate vision and roadmap to all stakeholders. Exceptional communication skills with diverse audiences. (including non-technical audiences)
Job Types: Full-time, Permanent
Salary: $8,000.00 to $10,000.00 /month

Title: Solutions Architect- Ad Technology
Description:
We are looking for a Solutions Architect to join our newly launched Advertising Technology team. This role operates within our Digital Product Solutions Architecture and Engineering team and is responsible for creating innovative, market-relevant solutions that meet the needs of Mediacorp. By applying the latest methods, you will ensure through an entrepreneurial process, the solutions created are compelling, viable and deployed. In this role, you will collaborate with colleagues across Analytics, Engineering and Product Management practices to help our advertising businesses grow in entirely new ways. The role will also work alongside stakeholders in our Ad Operations and Sales teams. This is a full time position, integral to the smooth operation and growth of Mediacorp's Digital Advertising Business.

As a Solutions Architect - Ad Technology, you will:
Design and implement innovative solutions to complex advertising scenarios where analysis of situations requires an in-depth knowledge of objectives.
Work with business and technology representatives to identify functional and technical requirements.
Clear and concise articulation, presentation, and documentation of technical opportunities, constraints, recommendations, and action items to internal & external audiences. Facilitate the creation and maintenance of proper product documentation.
Translate complex functional, technical and business requirements into architectural designs.
Assess Digital advertising technology choices to determine fit, including software, hardware, etc.
Research and analyze market landscapes and emerging platforms, patterns, practices, and methodologies to drive differentiated service offerings.
Working cross-functionally with internal teams to ensure timely and quality release of product/enhancements.
Serve as a product evangelist and subject matter expert.
Manage projects with top-down oversight throughout entire execution to ensure success as defined by adherence to standards of scope, budget, and timeline.
Monitor project progress continuously and make detailed scheduled reports on measurable items, such as milestones and deliverables.
Exceptional relationship management and project management skills.
Requirements:
More about You:
You are passionate about a culture of learning and consulting. You love challenging yourself to constantly enhance, and sharing your knowledge to empower others.
You like to take risks when looking for novel solutions to complex and diverse problems. If faced with roadblocks, you continue to reach higher to make great things happen.
You care about solving big, systemic problems. You look beyond the surface to understand root causes so that you can build long-term solutions for the ecosystem.
Requirements:
Minimum 5 years of experience as a Technical/Solution specialist in Advertising solutions.
Minimum 2-3 years of experience, building, implementing & managing MarTech & Ad Tech solutions.
Experience with the quickly evolving marketing technology landscape, with subject matter expertise in one or more of the following areas: Google Ad Manager, DMP, DSP, CDP, and tagging & data onboarding.
Knowledge of programmatic 2nd & 3rd party data & media landscape & consumer data matching “walled garden” platforms like Facebook and Google. Digital audio experience is a bonus.
Agile development methodologies and knowhow of software development lifecycle.
Bachelor's’ Degree preferred (Computer Science, Information Technology or related concentrations)
Strong analytical, communication and interpersonal skills.
Outstanding time and project management skills, ability to execute multiple projects simultaneously and ability to work independently.
Good organizational, multi-tasking, and time-management skills. Familiarity with online media buying and selling, advertising technology solutions, and ad network business models
Knowhow of database and analytic technologies is good to have

Title: Public Sector Head of Solutions Architect - Singapore
Description:
15+ years of experience growing and managing customer-facing, technical pre-sales and post-sales resources.
Experience architecting and deploying production Cloud workload.
10+ years software/technology customer facing experience.
Demonstrated experience coaching, mentoring, and developing technical professionals.
Working knowledge of software development lifecycle, tools, and methodologies.
Demonstrated ability to adapt to new technologies and learn quickly.
Excellent oral and written communication skills with a demonstrated ability to influence technical and non-technical audiences including those at the Executive leadership level.
Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science (or related field).
Dynamic and creative, and willing to take on any challenge and make a big impact
Enjoy developing technical talent to achieve great things. You will have a passion for educating, training, and enabling cloud computing experts for a diverse and challenging set of Enterprise customers.
Have a strong understanding of solutions innovation. The ideal candidate will have past experience working with customers or similar role and leading architecture teams.

Amazon Web Services (AWS) is looking for experienced and motivated customer facing pre-sales leaders to coach, grow, and partner with technically skilled, customer-facing Solutions Architects. You will help develop the industry’s best cloud-based solutions architects by enabling and coaching them on best practices, solution selling, presentation and speaking skills, as well as how to create and present architectures of widely varying size and complexity. In collaboration with sales, you will drive revenue growth across a broad set of customers. If you think you have what it takes to lead the best in the industry, AWS is hiring Managers for our Solutions Architects.

In this role, you must enjoy learning and introducing new technology in order to help colleagues and customers embrace and adopt new technology. Furthermore, thought leadership in terms of looking beyond the technology and considering the value technology creates for our customers, and helping to change how technology is viewed are important aspects of the role.

The Head of Solutions Architect, will be a lead technical strategist for the Singapore sales team. The role will work closely with their Amazon Web Services (AWS) Solution Architect peers and AWS Professional Services teams across the organization to develop and promote well architected cloud best-practices, including data security and regulatory compliance. The role will influence AWS product and services teams to help evolve AWS offerings for more rapid global Public Sector adoption.
Under your guidance the team will develop their best practice behaviors and skills in solution selling, presentation and speaking skills, as well as how to create and present architectures of widely varying size and complexity for Government and nonprofit customers. You will work very closely with sales leadership to establish technical credibility and develop long-term customer relationships.
You will bring a strong understanding of large scale computing solutions. You will likely have past experience working as a Solutions Architect and managing a highly technical team. In addition, you will have significant experience working with customers and partners, and will have worked with the most senior contacts and executives. Ideally you will have extensive experience in the public sector in the Singapore and be familiar with the challenges and opportunities that these customers bring.

MBA or other Master’s degree.
Professional experience architecting and deploying production workloads on AWS.
Experience with on-premises to Cloud migrations and IT transformations.
Professional exposure architecting or developing on AWS, including AWS certification.
AWS Certification, eg. AWS Solutions Architect Associate & Professional

Title: Senior Application Architect
Description:
We are looking for a Senior Applications Architect with enterprise background on system integration. You will be required to work on a project to revamp and redesign an existing legacy application to new technologies and modern technology stack. Knowledge and experience on multiple frameworks, platforms, and long term integration projects will be crucial in driving the strategy into success.
Senior Application Architect
Have you ever thought of working with a company that provides a wide range of services and has robust product engagements with enterprise businesses? Our client has a wide range of support and products within cloud computing, unified communications, collaboration, Big Data, Internet of things, and Artificial Intelligence. This company has a presence all over the globe and will give you a valuable portfolio to add under your belt.
We are looking for a Senior Applications Architect with enterprise background on system integration. You will be required to work on a project to revamp and redesign an existing legacy application to new technologies and modern technology stack. Knowledge and experience on multiple frameworks, platforms, and long term integration projects will be crucial in driving the strategy into success.
The role of a Senior Application Architect will be located in Singapore, are looking to looking for a challenge your experience and work with a client that values their employees? If yes, this is your chance!
What will you be doing?
Guide the design of technical software from the business requirements by leveraging design methods, patterns, and best practices
Analyze the client's information technology requirements, translate these needs into system and architecture requirements to ensure architecture design is met accordingly.
Take ownership of the application architecture until it is going live, vendor's management, escalate issues, delivery, and find relevant people to fix problems when required.
Work with a complex system integration project, legacy, to migrate old application to modern stack.
What are we looking for?
10 years of Java/J2EE application architecture experience.
Professional experience in designing, project integration, application development and leadership at the enterprise level.
Influential people communication skills that, and comfortable with senior employees, management, stakeholders, and customers.
Familiar with tools, technologies, and servers like; Java, J2EE, JBoss, WebLogic server, BPMS/BRMS, Oracle, GitHub, Jenkins, Azure/AWS (Amazon web services), CICD (continuous integration and continuous delivery), Spring and Hibernate.
Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or related disciplines
Good understanding of functional and non-functional requirements, technology risks and limitations

Title: #SGUNITEDJOBS SENIOR SOLUTION ARCHITECT
Description:
We are seeking a Senior Solution Architect, who will be part of Group Enterprise 5G/IoT product house software development team. The successful candidate is one who has deep understanding the architecture and design of the 5G business services platform and contribute on the customer solution design and trials for the 5G business services platform . In this position you will work with the different development, business and product teams, to:
Understand in depth, the architecture and design of the 5G business services platform to the extent of being able to install and deploy the platform for enterprise customer trial engagements.
Design solution architectures for 5G apps and facilitate trial deployments of the 5G apps on the business services platform
Co-develop 5G applications with enterprise customers and partners and facilitate customer trials/experiments and internal R&D trials/experiments.
Participate and advise on common platform functionality, and consistent, best-practice application design.
Participate on the move to full SaaS deployment and management
Contribute technical and thought leadership to the SingTel’s 5G platform initiative, and how to leverage IoT and big data management, Security/privacy, AI/ML components into the platform architecture.
Evangelize the platform for use by other business units within SingTel and group companies, and lead the solution design for these applications to effectively use the platform.
Interact with implementation partners and customers to understand their needs, and feed this back to the development teams and roadmap.
Participate in technical partnership conversations and due diligence.
Participate and lead in technical evaluations of partner technology with a hands on approach.

Prioritize business requests and co-create product roadmap with the product owner

Support Product Manager for product planning and prioritization activities
Support effective business change by building relationships with business leaders, technology and operational business partners
Become an effective “bridge” between users and technology. Manage the communication and regular updates to business stakeholders on product releases and issues
Identify risks and issues early, plan mitigating steps and communicate these to stakeholders in a timely manner
Strong stakeholder management ability in handling wide-ranging and senior stakeholders (across segments/product areas)
Work with the team to manage the product backlog

Facilitate communication at the team level in order to create consensus on scope, design decisions, and implementation decisions. Proactively Identify risks/issues that might affect the squad’s overall health
Respond promptly to issues raised, through a good understanding of business, operational and technical considerations, and recommend sound solutions
Lead and manage issues during UAT/Sprints, and ensure all requirements have proper traceability
Work experience in Big Data technology stack - Hadoop, Spark, Python, etc. is preferred
Having worked in Big Data platforms, a building Data lake is an added advantage

business analysis and Big data technology stack: 5 years (Preferred)

Singapore (Preferred)

Title: SVP / VP, Development Lead (C2MA), Group Consumer Banking an...
Description:
Business Function

Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.
Job Purpose
The selected candidate is required to take on the Senior Development Lead role and manage the technical analysis, engineering and development work related to CBG Customer Management and Analytics.
Manage end-to-end delivery of C2MA initiative across countries
Provide efforts sizing and Technical design specifications for Business & Tech initiatives
Work with business and tech stakeholders on alignment of requirements and delivery to ensure reuse
Align to architecture principles and standards & make sure the deliverables and solutions adhere to organization design principles.
Provide strong governance controls over the technology environment, in accordance with established standards and procedures.
Key Accountabilities
Lead/support new projects as development lead capacity with an essential understanding of Big Data, Customer Management and Analytic.
Understand and worked in AGILE development environment
Champion the change management to on-board initiatives and application across consumer banking group into Big Data Platform by providing leadership, guidance and full ownership of success on-boarding
Able to propose approaches to improve quality of process models, data ingestion best practices, metadata definition and data modelling
Able to understand business requirements and business value to be delivered
Creation, maintenance and delivery of trainings.
Timely delivery of projects and initiatives assigned.

Responsibilities
As the Senior Development Lead, you are responsible to understand the requirements, analyse the functional delivery, define specification, designing, writing, debugging and testing
Experience in Big Data, Analytics and Machine Learning is a MUST.
Ability to provide insights and guidance to the team with best software development practices and techniques.
Ability to direct the team from concept, solution design to testing and implementation.
Adhere to corporate standards, policies and architectural direction in developing the software
Participate in requirements analysis and be able to make risk assessments of larger system design and come up with alternative designs.
Research in new 3rd party/open source libraries, new technologies.
Evaluate and communicate technical risk and ensure applications are delivered against a schedule with the highest quality.
As part of the team, you will be called upon to design, estimate, develop, test and document the delivery over the entire lifecycle from inception to implementation.
Working with architect, data modeller, business analyst and End Users within organization.
Lead the team in the Development of Test Scenarios / Test Plan and to perform technical / functional testing to ensure requirements are well met
Lead the team in conducting performance load testing and regression testing.
Lead the team to perform analysis and troubleshooting of defects
Responsible for mentoring junior developers.
Requirements
In-depth industry and academic knowledge with minimum 10 years proven experience in process analysis and design, preferably in financial services/banking related to Big Data and Analytic
Minimum 7 years’ hands on experience using modelling tools for process and end-to-end solution design. Data Management knowledge and experience required.
Development experience Apache Spark, Apache Hadoop.
Development experience using Apache Airflow.
Development experience in Java/Scala and pride in producing clean, maintainable code.
Proficient in tools such as Git, Bitbucket, Jenkins, Artifactory, Nexus
Strong understanding of Distributed systems.
Knowledge and experience on how data and application are integrated with business processes, policies and regulations
Highly organized and structured thinking and ability to understand and synthesize unstructured information.
Proven ability and experience in data transformation tool training, internal awareness and cross team engagements.
Desired experience on Big Data or similar Data Warehouse tool.
Strong communication and presentation skills.
Analytical thinking and ability to understand and synthesize unstructured information
Knowledge around business process modelling, Information Systems analysis and design, enterprise technology and data modelling
Knowledge in risk and governance concepts.
Strong team player with management skills
Apply Now

We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

Title: #SGUNITEDJOBS DATA SCIENTIST
Description:
Data Scientist (Full-Time)
Job Responsibilities
Mine and analyze data from company databases to drive optimization and improvement of product development, marketing techniques and business strategies
Work closely with the Lead Solutions Architect, and is able to work with minimal guidance
Employ previous knowledge of Data Science and statistical analysis to collect, analyse and interpret large data sets
Dedicated to the Big Data section of this project
Employ working knowledge of Machine Learning code and algorithms and facilitate the integration into our existing software
Develop custom data models and algorithms to data sets
Drive business results with data-based insights
Use predictive modelling to increase and optimise customer experiences, revenue generation and targeting of customers
Develop company A/B testing framework and test model quality
Develop processes and tools to monitor and analyse model performance and data accuracy

Job Requirements
Possesses strong fundamentals on building data analytic models from scratch, and has a portfolio of prior completed projects to show
Adept at using large data sets to find opportunities for product and process optimisation, and using models to test the effectiveness of different courses of action
Extensive background in data mining and statistical analysis
Able to understand various data structures and common methods in data transformation
Able to take on open sourced code, and customise and build on them
Excellent pattern recognition and predictive modelling skills
Has prior front end or back end coding experience in one or more of the following: Java, Python, Javascript
Knowledge of advanced statistical techniques and concepts (regression, properties of distribution, statistical tests and proper usage etc.)
Knowledge of a variety of machine learning (ML) techniques (clustering, decision tree learning, artificial neural networks, and their real/world applications.
Minimum 2 years of practical experience with SAS, ETL, data processing, database programming and data analytics
Knowledge and experience in statistical and data mining techniques: GLM/Regression, Random Forest, Boosting, Trees, text mining, social network analysis etc.

Title: VP, Solution Architect (Core Banking), Group Consumer Bankin...
Description:
Business Function

Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.

Responsibilities
Be part of team of solution architects and domain experts to provide fit for purpose solutions.
Transform requirements into architecture and blueprint for the solution being created. Conversion that is based on several factors: previous, successful design patterns, reference architectures and enterprise architecture guidance.
Understands business functions, construct a solution architecture around Microservices and APIs, and be able to decompose monolith applications into meaningful implementable Microservices and APIs in a Cloud/DevOps environment.
Provide technology perspective to business to help guide roadmap and prioritization by keeping abreast with industry trends. Where required, help business size the complexity of problem and help simplify and define MVP.
Provide technical leadership and guidance to the development team, during the SDLC. Get development team’s buy-in into accepting the design to be implemented.
Ensure that the solution architecture aligns with the roadmaps established by the enterprise architecture, and that it adheres to the enterprise architecture principles. Act as the bridge between Enterprise / Application Architecture and Delivery.
Be a consumer and contributor to enterprise architecture collateral. The patterns and guidance developed should be reusable in a broader enterprise architecture context.
Document and manage how multiple applications are poised to work together. Involves defining the interaction between application packages, databases, and middleware systems in terms of functional coverage.

Experience in design Cloud native, Event based and Microservice Architecture.
Deep End-to-End Enterprise Architecture understanding, including Enterprise Java Stack (JEE), Rich UI and Front-End technologies, Middleware technologies (Tibco, Solace etc), Mainframe technologies, Databases (SQL & No SQL), Data Warehouses, and Core Banking solutions.
Experienced in streaming technology or framework such as Kafka and able to select suitable technology for given situation, code quality Api/tool, logging/tracing, circuit breakers.
Experienced working in a cloud native work environment, spring cloud data, Spring Security, oAuth, service monitoring on cloud, PaaS environment such as Pivotal, Kubernetes.
Deep understanding of Enterprise Integration and Messaging Patterns, SOA Governance practices
Strong communication skills including engaging senior management on strategic plans, leading project steering committees and status updates etc
Experienced in Agile methodology.
Ability to work independently and handle multiple concurrent initiatives
Excellent organizational, vendor management, negotiation, and prioritization skills
Excellent team player and strong interpersonal skills
Proactive and able to work under pressure, strong problem-solving skills and positive “can do” attitude
Preferred Skills
Experience with event based and microservice solutions developed in large cloud computing infrastructures such as Amazon Web Services, Azure Cloud, and/or Google Cloud
Prior experience as a enterprise/application architect in designing large, complex enterprise applications.
Presence in open source projects will be huge plus

This company is looking for dynamic data professionals who will be part of data engineering team, designing and developing high quality data products - data warehouse, data marts, data lake and data hubs - on cloud or on-premises system environments for the clients in government, public and private sectors. Title: Senior SQL Database Administrator - Banking - Singapore
Description:
Keyrus is an international consulting firm, specializing in the integration of data intelligence and Digital solutions. With over 3000 employees spread across 18 countries, Keyrus continues to deliver on such projects to a wide range of clients from various industries including but not limited to Banking/Finance, Healthcare/pharmaceuticals, FMCG, Oil & Gas, and more.
As part of Keyrus’ solution delivery, we are also in a position to recruit and place technical consultants to complement on existing client projects with their expertise. As such, we seek innovative and agile people to support ambitious and forthcoming technological challenges.
Our client is the world’s 11th largest bank by total assets.
Its Singapore center is one of the 3 main IT Hubs for their worldwide business and work daily with international branches located in 33 countries by:
- Envisioning and preparing the Bank’s futures information systems- Partnering and supporting core banking flagships and transverse areas in their large scale development projects.
Job summary
He/She will be a technical L2 resource for MSSQL database services. As such, he/she will provide support for all production support activities within the Database team in Singapore. He/She is accountable for the overall health and stability of the technical solutions within his scope. He/She has to effectively work with technical peers such as architects, peer experts and project teams on technology road maps and projects. He/She will work with L3/Service Manager to gain control over the scope of technical activities, develop best practices and gain knowledge over all aspects of support.
The Database team operates the RUN activities and delivers projects for its infrastructure scope covering all Database associated technologies.
Job detailed description
As a L2 resource of his /her team, he /she:
Takes up technical tasks and also manages delegation for technical issues within the team,
animates the team to encourage collaboration and sharing of best practices,
supports new technologies and leverages them to provide consistency of service across streams,
proposes service improvements for all Big Data services supported throughout the organization,
documents, reviews, maintains and shares relevant technical information within the team
provides technical knowledge, supports services both proactively and reactively to maintain the availability and reliability of system infrastructure in accordance to the SLA,
works in line with policies based on LEAN best practices,
Actively engages during any high severity issue and drives for issue resolution.
reviews technology changes to identify potential risks,
Primary Responsibilities
Manage Production Server Environment
Creation and Maintenance of Database Instances
24x7 Production support including scheduled and emergency night and weekend work.
Install, configuring, applying patches to SQL server
OS level activities related to database tasks which is including SPN creation user mgmt
Knowledge in Replication, Log Shipping, Clustering
Schema Object, Partition Management, Index Management
Follow the IT service management guideline while working with tools like ‘remedy, HPSC, etc
Document best practices and maintain the knowledge base
Knowledge in DTS,SSIS,SSRS ,SSAS components.
As an experienced professional in Database tehnology, he/she:
supports his/her team during diagnosis when technical issues rise in his/her scope of expertise,
is aware of the global IT structure so that he/she anticipates interrelationships within the organization,
engages with technical peer, Development team, Service managers, Architect and project teams on technology roadmap and projects,
facilitates transformation projects and suggest future directions for new areas of improvement and change,
guarantees the production readiness and license to operate of new projects and solutions
is available and able to drive technically, any complex or high severity incidents that occur within the scope of their role,
actively engages to understand new technologies and technology trends and reviews them with a view to incorporating them into the operations,
actively assists in identifying the most technical skilled candidates for open roles,
technically coach and develop partner resources to improve quality and productivity,
Job specific environment and/or organization
Fluent English - written and spoken
French language is desirable
Working hours will primarily match Europe business hours
On-call support will be expected on a rotational basis
Candidate profile
Mandatory track record
Manage SQL Server databases
Configure and maintain database servers and processes
Monitor system's health and performance
Ensure high levels of performance, availability, sustainability and security
Analyze, solve, and correct issues in real time
Provide suggestions for solutions
Refine and automate regular processes, track issues, and document changes
Assist developers with query tuning and schema refinement
Provide 24x7 support for critical production systems
Perform scheduled maintenance and support release deployment activities after hours
experience of High Availability (HA) and Disaster Recovery (DR) options for SQL Server
- Providing premium In-house Banking applications
Job Types: Full-time, Contract, Permanent
Experience:
DTS,SSIS,SSRS ,SSAS: 3 years (Preferred)
SQL technologies: 3 years (Preferred)
Location:
Singapore (Preferred)

Title: Senior Application Architect
Description:
We are looking for a Senior Applications Architect with enterprise background on system integration. You will be required to work on a project to revamp and redesign an existing legacy application to new technologies and modern technology stack. Knowledge and experience on multiple frameworks, platforms, and long term integration projects will be crucial in driving the strategy into success.
Senior Application Architect
Have you ever thought of working with a company that provides a wide range of services and has robust product engagements with enterprise businesses? Our client has a wide range of support and products within cloud computing, unified communications, collaboration, Big Data, Internet of things, and Artificial Intelligence. This company has a presence all over the globe and will give you a valuable portfolio to add under your belt.
We are looking for a Senior Applications Architect with enterprise background on system integration. You will be required to work on a project to revamp and redesign an existing legacy application to new technologies and modern technology stack. Knowledge and experience on multiple frameworks, platforms, and long term integration projects will be crucial in driving the strategy into success.
The role of a Senior Application Architect will be located in Singapore, are looking to looking for a challenge your experience and work with a client that values their employees? If yes, this is your chance!
What will you be doing?
Guide the design of technical software from the business requirements by leveraging design methods, patterns, and best practices
Analyze the client's information technology requirements, translate these needs into system and architecture requirements to ensure architecture design is met accordingly.
Take ownership of the application architecture until it is going live, vendor's management, escalate issues, delivery, and find relevant people to fix problems when required.
Work with a complex system integration project, legacy, to migrate old application to modern stack.
What are we looking for?
10 years of Java/J2EE application architecture experience.
Professional experience in designing, project integration, application development and leadership at the enterprise level.
Influential people communication skills that, and comfortable with senior employees, management, stakeholders, and customers.
Familiar with tools, technologies, and servers like; Java, J2EE, JBoss, WebLogic server, BPMS/BRMS, Oracle, GitHub, Jenkins, Azure/AWS (Amazon web services), CICD (continuous integration and continuous delivery), Spring and Hibernate.
Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or related disciplines
Good understanding of functional and non-functional requirements, technology risks and limitations
Huxley, a trading division of SThree Pte Limited (Registration Number: 200720126E | SThree Pte Limited Licence Number 16S8216 | Huxley Licence Number 53132076J)
Award winner of:
International Recruitment Company of the Year by Recruitment International 2016
Best Client Services by Asia Recruitment Awards 2017
Best Overseas Operation by Global Recruiters 2017
Highly Commended for Best Large Recruitment Business 2017

Title: Contract Data Engineer, Digital Transformation & Data Scienc...
Description:
Purpose of job:
Support the Data Science team in:
Ensuring optimised data collection and data flow
Helping project manage and coordinate DT's data ingestion and data processing pipelines across platforms
Ensuring that all data systems meet our business requirements and allow scalability
Main Responsibilities:
Collaborate with the data science team to create data tools to assist the team in building and optimising our data-related initiatives
Help setup, configure, deploy and validate machine learning models and analytics scripts on Amazon Sagemaker
Develop data integrations (through API, SFTP etc) between AWS S3, Redshift instances and on-premise database instances (e.g. HANA)
Work closely with team to identify, define, ingest and process data from multiple sources in support of model development
Analyse and assess the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources (e.g. datasets received from stakeholders) and annotation/ labelling of new training inputs.
Assemble large, complex datasets that meet functional and non-functional business requirements
Identify, design and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimising data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.
Work closely with vendors and internal stakeholders to project manage and coordinate DT’s data ingestion and data processing pipelines across platforms which can include mobile apps, SaaS platforms, on-premise databases and partner systems
Support the integration and deployment of developed algorithms, machine learning and analytical models into current analytics system/production
Develop monitoring toolkits to ensure that integration is executed successfully and alerts where integrations have failed
Help architect DT’s data integrations and data processing flows between external / 3rd party data sources, AWS cloud datawarehouses (e.g. Redshift) and internal on-premise database instances for workloads at scale
Provide guidance to internal teams on best practices for cloud to on-premise data integrations
Develop set processes for data mining, data modelling and data production
Recommend different ways to constantly improve data reliability and quality, including helping review and enhance the existing data collection procedures to include data for building analytics models relevant for industry transformation

Requirements:
At least 2 years of experience in a related field with real-world skills.
Working experience for structured and unstructured datasets is essential.
Able to build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management.
Experienced data pipeline builder and data wrangler who enjoys optimising data systems and building them from ground up, and familiar with:
Big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Sqoop, etc.
Relational SQL and noSQL databases, including Postgres and Cassandra.
AWS cloud services: EC2, S3, EMR, Redshift, RDS, Lambda functions.
AWS Sagemaker.
Stream-processing systems: Storm, Spark-Streaming, etc.
Data pipeline and workflow management tools.
Object-oriented / object function scripting languages: Python, R, Java, etc.
Building and optimising ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures and datasets.
Performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.
Strong analytics skills related to working with structured and unstructured datasets.
Intellectual curiosity to find new and unusual ways of how to solve data management issues.
Experience in using Qliksense will be advantageous.

Additional Information:
Contract role for 11 months

We regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Title: #SGUNITEDJOBS CLOUD INFRASTRUCTURE SOLUTIONS ARCHITECT
Description:
We are looking for a AWS Enterprise cloud architect who will be responsible for Architecture, design, implementation of the AWS infrastructure. A key responsibility is to collaborate with other team members to develop automation strategies and deployment processes. You will become an integral part of the team, making every problem of the platform a problem of your own, and solving them accordingly.

Responsibilities
Possess at least 5+ years of experience in Planning (including design
and architecture), installing, configuring & maintaining AWS Cloud
environments
Designing of AWS based blue print architecture
Design and implement Cloud Security
Design and implement backup and restoration
Research, improvise and tune Cloud environment for optimal utilization
Ensure compliance to security as per organization’s required standards
Work with business users, third party vendors, internal application and Databases teams on requirements and design solution that best fits the needs at the same time ensure the design meets defined SLA's.
Provide complete guidance to the team and encourage cloud adoption.
Work with internal teams to achieve project milestones and deliver on internal commitments.
Skills
Expert knowledge of AWS Cloud architecture
Strong skills with in-depth knowledge of different AWS technologies services, security policies, best practices
Experience and strong knowledge in AWS Well architected framework and IaaS architectures
Experience in AWS cloud migrations of Enterprise applications and analytical workloads (databases & applications)
Experience in setup and managing of HA architectures, monitoring in AWS cloud
Experience in setup and support of AWS Infrastructure for large scale enterprise customers
Experience with multi Cloud integrations, Hybrid Cloud setups,
Experience with Google Cloud Platform and Azure Cloud may be an added advantage, not mandatory
Strong infrastructure background covering VM, OS, Storage, network and security layers
Experience with Linux in a multi-domain environment including basic commands and shell scripting
Experience in Python scripting.
Required Qualifications:
A minimum of 5 years experience on design and implementation of AWS based technologies with minimum 2 years as enterprise architecture.
Deeper understanding of data analytics technologies (Big Data, Data lake, EMR, Oracle, SQL)
Greater exposure to Operating system platforms (Windows & Linux)
Complete knowledge on IDMS (Active directory & LDAP)
Prior working experience on Network & Security domains.
This position may demand around 10% in travel

Title: Cloud Solution Architect
Description:
We are looking for a passionate Cloud Solution Architect to be based in Singapore and support deals engagements across Asia. This is a pre-sales engineering role where you would need to build trust with customers, leading to successful deal closures. You will be responsible for all aspects of the solutions engagement, including architectural design sessions, driving proof of concept, project engagements as well as initial implementations. The successful candidate has a strong start-up mentality and experience, as well as proven track record within a cross-cultural multi-national corporation.
Key Responsibilities:
Work hand-in-hand with sales leaders to identify and engage enterprise customers (across Asia).
Be a cloud advocate and champion public/hybrid/multi-cloud adoption among enterprise customers.
Expert in designing migrate-to-the-cloud architectures, map on-prem services to relevant services in public clouds, demonstrate TCO savings to customers
Partner with Project Managers and various solution teams to deliver and implement cloud projects for customers.
Key Qualifications:
Deep understanding of cloud computing technologies, business drivers, and emerging computing trends
Cloud certifications, including Microsoft Azure, Amazon Web Services
Demonstrated ability to leverage technology to drive measurable business value
Strong verbal and written communication skills
Comfortable interacting with and adapting messages for various audiences and groups, whether technical, business or executive
Requirements:
Computer Science, Technical or Math undergraduate degree highly desired (or equivalent work experience)
3+ years of architecture, design, implementation, and/or support of highly-distributed applications (i.e. having an architectural sense for ensuring cost, reliability, availability and performance).
Public cloud experience highly preferred.
Prior work experience in a Consulting/Architecture position within a software and/or services company such as: Microsoft, Amazon, Google, IBM, Avanade, etc, a plus
Prior work experience in start-ups and early-stage companies
Deep technical experience in one or more of the following areas: Software design or development Application Design, Systems Operations / Management, Database Architecture, Virtualization, IP Networking, Storage, IT Security, Linux, Windows.
Experience using R, Hadoop, or other big data analytics languages and translate into effective data visualization using tools such as: PowerBI, Tableau, Qlik, etc.
Outstanding presentation skills with a high degree of comfort with both large and small audiences
Personal Attributes:
Proven ability to work independently and effectively with limited supervision
A self-starter who is motivated to chart a new course for the organization as well as helping customers embark on their digital transformation
Strong interpersonal and communication skills

Title: #SGUNITEDJOBS FULL STACK SOLUTION ARCHITECT
Company: CARGILL ASIA PACIFIC HOLDINGS PTE. LTD.
Description:
Position Purpose & Summary:

The Solution Architect –Trading is responsible for consulting and providing direction on all management and development initiatives related to the APAC region for the complex Trading Ecosystem. The Ecosytem comprises an integrated mix of old and new technologies (CTRM, Trade Executions, Physicals Operations, Data & Analytics) with on-premise and SaaS based solutions in play.

This is a role with balanced responsibilities for understanding needs, both business and technical, and develops and maintains complex solutions that sustain and protect the integrity of the overall Trading Ecosystem and its complex set of integrations and interfaces to other parts of the organization such as Treasury and our ERP’s. By understanding the Trading domain and the latest technologies, the candidate has the opportunity to drive the modernization of front office trading applications, including systems of records and trading analytics technology.

Working closely with the global architects, the APAC solution architect will be responsible to assist managers in setting the medium term direction, roadmaps and standards for functional, process, and/or technical solutions, ensuring they align to the overall Enterprise Architecture and how global trading platforms can integrate into the APAC environment.

Familiarity with the Global IT Trading Strategy is key in order to provide the right counsel on all aspects of application development and architecture design including – performance, scalability, coding, caching, security, encryption, session state management, and error logging and testing. In addition, this position plays a key bridging role across requirements analysis, design, development and testing.
Utilizing robust knowledge of architecture, may play a role in negotiations with key vendors and participates in key vendor relationship management process.

The strategic importance of an Enterprise wide data driven strategy to drive the development of Digitalization and Analytics across the Trading environment globally requires this role to be effective in working with data architects, data modelers, data engineers and data scientists.

This position requires an expert in the architecture space with advanced knowledge to independently conduct the most complex activities. Responsible for managing a large portfolio of architecture solutions, with a long-term outlook.

This will include: Architecture strategy and planning, business partnering, relationship management and consulting, governance and portfolio management, architecture definition methodology, and people and budget management.

The position holder must demonstrate an ability to deal with ambiguity, work under pressure to tight deadlines and a willingness to develop strong knowledge and expertise in the trading domain.

The Solution Architect will act as a coach and mentor for more junior team members both onshore and offshore and may be involved as a technical subject matter expert in the resolution of Level3 application support issues.

Direct experience working in an Agile approach, is preferred, as is understand of DevOps environment and other technology trends.
Overall the role requires the resource to be able to link business process with current system map and assess complex issues from multiple angles. It also requires the resource to be a strategic thinker and have the experience to evolve the solution in place to adapt to changing clients needs as well as changes based on market trends.

Technical Skills: We work with a variety of vendor products and technologies. As such we prefer the successful candidate to have a broad exposure to multiple different initiatives. The role requires taking an unbiased structured approach to determining the best solutions, satisfying the requirements of a large number of stakeholders.
Business Knowledge: Commodities Trading, Physicals Trading and Operations, Risks & Valuation. Metals Trading experiences is desirable.

Principal Accountabilities:

60% - Project Execution - Systems Analysis and Development:
Analyses user system and application needs, determine and evaluate potential solutions, develop system specifications and requirements, and design application programs to meet the requirements.
Interacts with business and IT resources to understand and analyze business, functional, and technical requirements.
Works with business(es) to help shape the direction of the products based on a combined knowledge of what is technically feasible and what is desired by the end user.
Design and estimate integrated solutions which may include applications, databases, networks, and related systems
Provide consult and strategic architectural oversight during the design, build and test phases and tests automation of all projects
Provide advice on the resources required to support and execute projects.
Participate in the selection of those resources.
Provides coaching on the Ecosystem to 3rd parties engaged in our projects and/or training to more junior members of the team, including coaching Cargill core values (e.g. data privacy).
Work with business(es) to help shape the direction of the product based on a combined knowledge of what is technically feasible and what is desired by the end user.
Conduct design and code reviews with peers, business system analysts, and quality assurance teams.
Participate during system/integration/UAT testing and provide timely and accurate defect resolution.
Create the Material and provide the Governance in order to maintain the Ecosystem live and safe.

30% - Strategy, Business Partnering and Consulting:
Develops a good understanding of the Trading Business Unit (BU) Strategy and most specifically its direction in terms of Process, Data and Technology (PDT).
Develops a deep and broad understanding of the existing Global Trading Ecosystem.
Develops an understanding of the Cargill Metals, Cargill Agriculture Supply Chain (CASC), Enterprise Data & Digitalization Strategy and the strategic importance of the Cargill Data Platform (CDP)
Consults with Global Trading Solution Owners and Architects to ensure full awareness of target or solution architecture as part of the Global IT Trading Strategy.
Evaluates industry trends and vendor products in close consultation with Global Trading Solution Owners and Architects.
Provides leadership by pro-actively sharing insights and knowledge to advise BU and Functional Management on its Long-Term Strategic Direction for Process, Data and Technology (PDT) with the aim of finding better solutions.
Pro-actively participates in the assessment of potential projects and the development of a meaningful roadmap for delivery.
Plays a key leadership role in championing data as a corporate asset and ensuring the value realization of the investments Cargill is making in data and information.

10% - Project Management Office Leadership:
Develop a good understanding of the Cargill Data Platform (CDP) and some of the projects and initiatives being worked around it.
Collaborate effectively with our Cargill Data Team and Business Intelligence stakeholders.
Structure, implement, and maintain database systems.
Establish policies, standards and procedures to ensure useful and readily accessible data.
Analyse data requirements, develop and document data dictionary, and develop data models.
Develop, maintain and support associated databases.

Required Education & Experience:
BA/BS in Business, IT, or Computer Science or equivalent
10-15 years of IT and business / industry work experience
Experience with software development methodologies and SDLC
Ability to Deliver Results (Quality & Benefits)
Proven expertise in designing end to end solution.
Experienced working an offshore development model
Strong collaboration and influencing skills
Demonstrated ability to be successful in ambiguous situations
Experience working in a matrixed and leveraged organization
Experience anticipating emerging issues, problem solving and implementing new business solutions across process data and technology
Experience interacting effectively, confidentially and appropriately with various levels management and customers
Business fluency in English and local languages as defined
Willing to travel up to 15% of the time

Preferred Skills & Experience:
5 years’ experience working in Trading applications
Demonstrated experience in the design of clean, efficient, usable application interfaces from conceptualization to implementation
Proven track record of designing scalable, reliable, high performance software applications with an emphasis on Digitalization and Analytics
Proven track record of anticipating emerging issues, problem solving & implementing new solutions, including improving efficiency, quality, cost & productivity
Practical Experience with emerging technologies and tools (IoT, Data Analytics, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
Nice to have knowledge and exposure around Big Data and Cloud architecture.

Title: SVP / VP, Solution Architect (Branch & Self-Service Banking)...
Description:
Business Function

Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.

Job Purpose

This role is responsible for driving DBS’s technology architecture for the future of In-Branch Retail Banking applications & Self Service Technology.
Drive the solution architecture for a major transformation, relying on critical understanding of cloud native architecture, microservices, data management principles, big data, middleware technologies & distributed computing.
Driving the technological roadmap through understanding the needs of business and the business vision & alignment with broader T&O architectural direction.
Provide guidance to technology teams at a high level (technology vision) as well as ability to offer low level direction (sample code, specific application architecture, deployment pipelines).
Key Accountabilities
Defining and articulating solutions for projects, including business, application, data and infrastructure impacts along with testing and implementation considerations.
Developing pragmatic, feasible architectures, considering all functional as well as non-functional requirements (e.g. performance, capacity, accessibility, security, usability, auto-healing and auto-scaling, error budget).
Providing consultation to initiatives in defining or designing business processes and functions, as well as enabling technologies based on customer requirements.
Play a key role in defining the Enterprise Architecture and Engineering guidelines and then driving the same through to the various platform level architectures and engineering practices.

Responsibilities
Drive a target and consistent application architecture across the enterprise and different platforms in the bank.
Drive application & technical architectures to ensure scalability, data consistency, speed of access, appropriate monitoring & instrumentation
Define architecture across business functions & geographic regions.
Translate functional and non-functional requirements into design within the enterprise context; help business and technology define appropriate non-functional requirements and help in assessing the error budget defined.
Ensure application architecture uses best in breed enterprise wide and open source tools.
Participate in all phases of the SDLC driving architecture solutions and design decisions that result in scalable implementations of the systems.
Document and create reusable architecture and design specifications.
Provide strategic and tactical solutions for technical issues.
Conduct evaluation of new and emerging technology/tools as required.
Manage different stakeholders to arrive at end-to-end technical design.
Interact professionally with a diverse people such as management, executives and SMEs.
Travelling may be required.
Requirements
Proven experience as an enterprise scale architect
Strong understanding of applications across the application landscape i.e. frontline applications, compute engines, data stores etc..
Strong understanding of cloud native architecture, microservices, data management principles, big data, middleware technologies & distributed computing
Strong understanding of key Agile & Devops engineering practices
Must come from a development background wherein the ideal candidate would have developed mission critical systems in Microservices, Big Data technology stacks.
Must have worked in major transformation programs in a bank and have a strong ability to drive execution and consensus.
Demonstrate thorough understanding of modern enterprise architecture practices and hands on experience with enterprise application frameworks
Skilled at translating business strategy and project portfolio into short and long-term architectural plans, detailed requirements and models
Strong communication skills and must be able explain complex technical topics to the stakeholder community.
An undergraduate degree or higher.

And ideally you have….
Excellent knowledge of software and application design and architecture with mainframe applications and new stacks of software, Kafka, Cassandra, Camunda)
Development experience across: Apache Spark, Apache Hadoop, Apache Airflow, Java/Scala.
Strong knowledge of:
Core Java 8, Spring framework, SpringBoot, Spring Cloud
Angular JS,
Cloud Foundry (or equivalent),
MariaDB, EnterpriseDB, NoSQL (Cassandra, MongoDB, Elastic search), IMDG
RabbitMQ,
AWS / Amazon Web Services,
API gateway,
Linux, Unix systems
Drools/Activiti, and a range of open source libraries.
CI/CD (Jenkins, GitHub, SonarQube, Fortify etc
Docker
Test Driven Development (TDD) methodologies
Pride in producing clean, maintainable code
Proficient in tools such as Git, Bitbucket, Jenkins, Artifactory, Nexus
Strong understanding of Distributed systems
Highly organized and structured thinking and ability to understand and synthesize unstructured information

Apply Now

We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

Title: VP / AVP, Big Data Engineer, Group Consumer Banking and Big...
Description:
Business Function

Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.

About DBS

DBS is the World’s Best Digital Bank. We put digital priorities at the heart of banking, designing and creating products and services to help our customers. Digital innovation pervades every part of the bank, from our consumer banking arm to corporate banking arm. With a strong culture of innovation, experimenting with new technology and collaboration with the FinTech community, we aim to simplify banking so we can help others Live More, Bank Less.

The Opportunity

We’re looking for effervescent proponents of our vision who are driven to understand the impact of technology across varying levels all over the world to be part of a major transformation programme to reimagine banking.
Based in Singapore, you’ll be leveraging the latest technology to develop mission critical applications from scratch. You will be part of the strategic transformation programme which is engaging in UX, design thinking, Agile, cloud technologies, microservices and Big Data.

Responsibilities
Design and implement key components for highly scalable, distributed data collection and analysis system built for handling petabytes of data in the cloud.
Work with architects from other divisions contributing to this analytics system and mentor team members on best practices in backend infrastructure and distributed computing topics.
Analyze source data and data flows, working with structured and unstructured data.
Manipulate high-volume, high-dimensionality data from varying sources to highlight patterns, anomalies, relationships and trends
Analyze and visualize diverse sources of data, interpret results in the business context and report results clearly and concisely.
Apply data mining, NLP, and machine learning (both supervised and unsupervised) to improve relevance and personalization algorithms.
Work side-by-side with product managers, software engineers, and designers in designing experiments and minimum viable products.
Build and optimize classifiers using machine learning techniques and enhance data collection procedures that is relevant for building analytic systems.
Discover data sources, get access to them, import them, clean them up, and make them “model-ready”. You need to be willing and able to do your own ETL.
Create and refine features from the underlying data. You’ll enjoy developing just enough subject matter expertise to have an intuition about what features might make your model perform better, and then you’ll lather, rinse and repeat.
Run regular A/B tests, gather data, perform statistical analysis, draw conclusions on the impact of your optimizations and communicate results to peers and leaders.
Requirements
Experience in big data and machine learning
The ability to work with loosely defined requirements and exercise your analytical skills to clarify questions, share your approach and build/test elegant solutions in weekly sprint/release cycles.
Strong experience in managing a mid and large scale team (offshore and onshore)
Development experience in Java/Scala and pride in producing clean, maintainable code
Practical experience in clustering high dimensionality data using a variety of approaches
Real world experience in solving business problems by deploying one or more machine learning techniques
Experience creating pipelines to analyze data, extracted features and updated models in production.
Independence and self-reliance while being a pro-active team player with excellent communication skills.
Hands-on development with key technologies including Scala, Spark, and other relevant distributed computing languages, frameworks, and libraries.
Experience with distributed databases, such as Cassandra, and the key issues affecting their performance and reliability.
Experience using high-throughput, distributed message queueing systems such as Kafka.
Familiarity with operational technologies, including Docker (required), Chef, Puppet, ZooKeeper, Terraform, and Ansible (preferred).
An ability to periodically deploy systems to on-prem environments.
Mastery of key development tools such as GIT, and familiarity with collaboration tools such as Jira and Confluence or similar tools.
Experience with Teradata SQL, Exadata SQL, T-SQL
Strong experience in graph and stream processing
Experience in migrating SQL from traditional RDBMS to Spark and BigData technologies
Experience in building language parsers using ANTLR, query optimizers and automatic code generation
In-depth knowledge of database internals and Spark SQL Catalyst engine
Apply Now


We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.
