Title: #SGUNITEDJOBS SITE RELIABILITY ENGINEER
Description:
Site Reliability Engineer mentors the development team to write code, optimized for scale, automated operations, and graceful degradation. SRE is responsible for the operational support for the product (making sure it does not use more than 50% of their time). Works with the team to implement new features in the time remaining from their operations tasks. The SRE assists the team in implementing the DevOps strategy. This role is an expert in all systems used for monitoring and troubleshooting and assists the team in trouble shooting.
Minimum Years Of Experience
At least 10 Years of hands on experience in banking domain with Application Development , DevOps & ProdOps process with end-to-end visibility of the system with 4 years of hands on experience as an SRE Engineer.)
Expectations
1) Improvement in lead Time :
Improvement in lead time to respond/resolve Production incident.
(i.e. current vs new)
2) Proactive resolution of potential performance issues:
Number of potential issues discovered/fixed in lower environment to ensure its not propagated to the Prod
3)Issue Reoccurrence:
Number of issues reoccurred. Measuring the effectiveness of retrospective sessions.
4)Number of best practices implemented:
Impact of adopting the best practices in terms of performance gains.
Responsible to develop the initial on-call playbook, and to keep it updated as the product evolves and as features are added, removed or changed
Responsible for change management on the team, develops actionable plans to minimize outage risks tied to changes by focusing on
o Progressive rollouts
o Quick and accurate troubleshooting
o Efficient and reliable rollback of changes when required
Forecast demand and plan for adequate (optimal) capacity to satisfy natural product usage cycles and any surge demands, such as marketing campaigns, promotional campaigns, etc. This is done while not exceeding the computational budget agreed for the team.
Ensure load-shifting is completed as required to address usage variations and scheduled maintenance windows.

Experience with CI/CD pipelines & tooling (for example: Jira, Jenkins, Maven SonarQube, Fortify, NexusIQ etc.)
Good understanding of cloud native architecture, microservices, data management principles, big data, middleware technologies & distributed computing Proven experience with cloud platforms (AWS, PCF) is preferred.
5+ years of scripting/software experience (bash, python, java and perl)
Familiarity and working experience on DevOps testing and release techniques (i.e. A/B Testing, Blue / Green Deployments and Canary Release, etc…)
Working knowledge on DevOps tools/technologies (Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift) will be preferred.
Knowledge of database technologies (MariaDB/MySQL, etc..)
Strong understanding of all LINUX security best practicesExtensive experience in application/system/network performance and availability monitoring (Grafana, Vizceral, Tivoli, Splunk, etc..)
Proven technical leadership experience, including the ability to quickly understand an issue, appropriately / efficiently troubleshoot to detailed levels and direct swift resolution.
Strong ability to take ownership of issues and drive resolution across teams.
Assertive personality and drive improvement across environment.
Effective written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to develop strong client relationships and partner with technology engineering teams.
Work with SRE to perform the following and provide best practices / skills transitions:
1. Define the Availability , Reliability and scalability framework by aligning with the SLA needs of the business.
2. Closely work with the ProdOps team to define the standard operating procedure to handle production incidents and contingency situations.
3. Define the application monitoring ,alerting and reporting framework.
4. Collaborate with the solution architects and application development leads to co-create robust and scalable application frame work by providing best practices in design & coding.
5. Mentor development team & performance testing team to detect performance issues in early development life cycle.

Title: Ref: 119255 - Staff Architect
Description:
Realise your full potential with Asia's leading communications group. While we take pride in our 140-year heritage, our philosophy is to always look forward and evolve. Today, we are a leader in cutting-edge ICT innovation and digital advances, powered by a vast network of offices in countries and territories across Asia Pacific, the Middle East, Europe and the USA. Come be a part of our dynamic organisation as we create the infocomms landscape of the future.

Singtel are at the leading edge of technology development to improve the experience of our customers as they consume services across mobile, voice and data infrastructure, managed services, cloud computing, IT services and professional consulting. To support that journey we are searching for top talent and have an exciting opportunity for a Senior Architect to strengthen our team.

This is a strategic role focussing on Application Architecture for multiple digital channels and platforms.

Key Responsibilities and Results:
Understands business functions and transform requirements into architecture and blueprint for the solution being created. Need to propose new innovative solutions, updates to existing solutions, negotiate alternative options, build technical and release roadmaps.
Construct a solution architecture around Microservices and APIs and be able to decompose monolith applications into meaningful implementable Microservices and APIs in a Cloud/DevOps environment.
Work closely with the development team and get their buy-in into accepting the design to be implemented. Also, work with different stake holders, product owner, senior executives, external parties like system integrators, product partners.
Provide technology perspective to business to achieve roadmap and prioritization by keeping abreast with industry trends. Where required, help business size the complexity of problem and help simplify and define MVP.

Qualifications / Experience / Knowledge Required:
Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Engineering or its equivalent.
12+ years of experience in the technology industry including 8+ in architecture of scalable and high-performance internet facing systems.
Possess strong background and experience as a successful Software engineer/Architect in building large scale, highly available Internet and mobile applications.
Have in depth knowledge of cloud computing, microservices architecture (incl. design pattern, rest/grpc, gateway & service mesh etc.), DevOps, streaming architecture, modern data architecture, Mobile and Web application architecture.
Good experience in API security including OAuth2/OIDC, Tokens, mTLS etc.
Significant experience working on mission critical internet facing applications focusing on scalability, performance, architecture aspects.
Passion for architecture and ability to pick up and learn new technological advances very quickly.
Exhibits leadership in guiding team members, adapts to changes in technology and business domains, has good knowledge of latest trends in the market and is well respected within the team.
Solid understanding of Public Cloud (pref. AWS) architecture. AWS certification is a big plus.
Experience in Java, Spring boot, any modern messaging technology, any Traditional and NoSQL database is a big plus.
Ability to effectively communicate vision and roadmap to all stakeholders. Exceptional communication skills with diverse audiences. (including non-technical audiences)

If this description is exciting and you feel that you have the necessary skills and experience to make a difference, then please follow the link to apply. For more information on this and other opportunities please refer to our careers portal under https://groupcareers.singtel.com.

Let’s shape a better world through technology. Join us to lead the change.

Title: SVP / VP, Solution Architect (Branch & Self-Service Banking)...
Description:
Business Function

Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.

Providing consultation to initiatives in defining or designing business processes and functions, as well as enabling technologies based on customer requirements.

Define architecture across business functions & geographic regions.

Document and create reusable architecture and design specifications.
Provide strategic and tactical solutions for technical issues.

Manage different stakeholders to arrive at end-to-end technical design.
Interact professionally with a diverse people such as management, executives and SMEs.

Proven experience as an enterprise scale architect

Demonstrate thorough understanding of modern enterprise architecture practices and hands on experience with enterprise application frameworks
Skilled at translating business strategy and project portfolio into short and long-term architectural plans, detailed requirements and models
Strong communication skills and must be able explain complex technical topics to the stakeholder community.

Excellent knowledge of software and application design and architecture with mainframe applications and new stacks of software, Kafka, Cassandra, Camunda)

Title: Cyber Range Solutions Architect
Description:
The Business Entity, team and the requirement

By offering a complete portfolio of business and technology services, Cisco Customer Experience (CX) ensure that customers achieve successful business outcomes. Cisco CX has built a simulated environment that provides specialized technical training workshop to help Customer’s security staff build the skills and experience necessary to combat modern cyber threats by allowing the staff to play the role of both attacker and defender to learn the latest methods of vulnerability exploitation and the use of advanced tools and techniques to mitigate and remove threats.

APJC CX Security team has an immediate need for a senior cyber range architect who will be working as part of a dynamic and highly skilled team, The position offers interesting work for knowledgeable and experienced consultants with strong security design & operations expertise and highly developed customer-facing consulting skills.

Roles & Responsibilities:
Working in the APJC team of the Security Services Practice, the role of a Cyber Range Architect is to provide technical and Cyber Range practice leadership across the spectrum of information and cyber security with a very strong focus on Enterprise and Service Provider Security. The role requires a mix of security architecture & operations experience, pre-sales expertise, leadership of virtual teams for delivery of complex projects, and deep and wide technical expertise to support internal and external stakeholders. This is a regional role & the selected candidate will at the minimum

Own the Cisco’s cyber range simulation & training platform architecture and mentor the cyber range trainers & developers in various countries and development centers.
Develop training scenarios utilizing the Cyber Range platform and determine baseline configurations for training classes and cyber exercises.
Conceptualize, design and develop simulated attack scenarios & how they can be responded to using Cisco’s and our partner products.
Lead the evolution of the current cyber range platform into a state of the art Next Gen platform that incorporates the latest Cisco & our partner security products
Collaborate with the Cisco’s security service product management teams to drive key concepts, designs, document architectural expectation and align with key stake holders.
Stay abreast of industry trends, and assess new technologies to ensure that our platform and service offers are market leading.
Other responsibilities may include but are not limited to conducting training on our Cyber range platforms and configuration and assisting with the implementation of training, exercise, and event virtual enclaves.
Represent the Cisco Security Solutions team on internal and external events
Required Skills

At least 10+ years of security experience is required which must include customer-facing roles together with clearly demonstrable experience of multi-vendor solutions.
At least 5+ years of experience in security operations, defensive and offensive cyber Tactics, Techniques and Procedures.
Expert knowledge in cybersecurity concepts such as network vulnerabilities, network attack vectors, attack signatures, and technical mitigation.
Knowledge of security products and hands-on deployment knowledge in NetFlow analysis , Next-generation firewall/IPS, Identity Services Engine , TrustSec, Web security, Email Security , Wireless Security, Virtual Security and big data analytics.
Good knowledge in modern threat detection and analysis methodologies, system-level attacks and mitigation methods with a core competency in Windows and Linux.
Good to have Splunk, SIEM and Big Data Mining skills
Excellent written and verbal presentation skills.
Extremely strong technical account liaison and customer management, consulting skills are mandatory.
Desired Skills

Experience in architecting and deploying Cyber Range test beds and solutions, associated training services
Experience developing tools to automate procedures and integration using languages such as Python, Java, Javascript or C/C++/C#.
Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in a relevant subject is assumed and an advanced degree
MBA or MSc in Information Security is preferred.
CISSP, CISA, CISM, CEH and CHFI qualifications are all beneficial as is BS7799/ISO27000 lead auditor and Cisco Certified Design Expert (CCDE).
CCIE R&S and Security is beneficial
Experience in the configuration and working with a wide variety of technology including but not limited to: camera systems, Industrial Control Systems, Internet of Things (IoT) devices, building management systems, and radio frequency (RF) communications devices will be an added advantage.
About Cisco

We connect everything: people, processes, data, and things. We innovate everywhere, taking bold risks to shape the technologies that give us smart cities, connected cars, and handheld hospitals. And we do it in style with unique personalities who aren’t afraid to change the way the world works, lives, plays and learns. We are thought leaders, tech geeks, pop culture aficionados, and we even have a few purple haired rock stars. We celebrate the creativity and diversity that fuels our innovation. We are dreamers and we are doers. We Are Cisco.

Title: #SGUNITEDJOBS DELIVERY MANAGER, DATA
Description:

You will implement and support technology that enables Income to become Data Driven Organization and engage our customers digitally.

As a technology guru, provide hands-on technical leadership and guidance to the development teams under your charge to design and develop new software solutions
Provides strategic vision, architecture, and roadmap for Enterprise Data Warehouse platform aligned to business and technological requirements across all platform technologies.
Evaluate and implement new technologies that are capable to digitally transform Insurance Operations processes, including Data Lake/EDW/ODS, Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning.
Upholds Security and Compliance protocols for data exchange Collaborates with leaders to understand interoperability needs and delivers value-added solutions.
Responsible for timely delivery of Application Services specifically in the Financial Data Warehouse and reporting space
Accountable for meeting the Application Services Optimization targets agreed with the customer
Support with new Application Services proposals, drive pursuits and execution of contracts
Lead engagement planning and budgeting
Leads team change management that supports the overall business strategy Identifies and implements technical and procedural solutions aligned with operating objectives.
Lead the team in resolving technical debts and defects to ensure that the solution remains reliable and robust
Perform system analysis, design and code reviews to ensure solutions are maintainable, secure and release with good quality
Ensure application designs adhered to architectural roadmap, including implementation of DevSecOps, automated testing, Single Source truth, Data Marts and Data As Service in Income’s hybrid cloud environment
Mobilize and manage both BAU& enhancement team
Ensure that the service performance meets or exceeds established goals / SLAs
Manage customer expectations and escalations
Ensure ETL/ELT development adhered to Income’s software development life cycle process (Waterfall and Agile) and standards
Develop metrics to track development competencies by skills set and applications. Work with team to continuously make improvements and achieve higher competencies
Responsible for the Business Data Glossary, Dictionary, Classification and Lineage
Manage Data Quality rules, measures and identify gaps and implement a remediation plan
Govern Referential Data and mapping across systems, Data Lake and Multi Cloud/ Hybrid Cloud
Responsible for Data Extraction approval process and automating this securely with Data Governance Policies.
Responsible for maintaining Data Privacy, Protection and Security standards and controls
Regular Dashboard Reporting on Data Quality, Maturity and KPIs
Manage Data Board and present in leadership forums on data policy & standards
Qualifications
Degree from a recognized university in Information Technology, Software Engineering or equivalent
Data & ETL Tools Certified Solutions Architect is an added advantage
Certified Project Management Professional or Scrum Master is an added advantage
Hands-on application design, development and implementation experience
Experience leading a team of engineers to deliver application solutions in a hybrid cloud environment
Experience in delivering applications using both Waterfall and Agile Scrum methodologies
Knowledge of core insurance data model is an advantage
Strong interpersonal skills including mentoring technical team and team building
Strong advocate of standards and challenge status quo with new and emerging technology to address new business challenges.
Excellent oral and written communications skills and experience interacting with both business and IT individuals at all levels including the executive level
Experience with delivering large scale enterprise applications using big data open source solutions such as SSIS, Hadoop, Spark, Kafka and Elastic Search
Deep technical understanding to interact with a cross functional team of architect, engineers in different geographic locations
Experience defining, owning and managing roadmap for delivering enterprise solutions
Knowledge of ETL/ELT processes and best practices, data quality, data integration using tools
Knowledge of SQL and usage of one or more of these DBs: Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL
Experience or knowledge of non-relational DBs eg: Hbase
Knowledge of Insurance domain and industry standard interoperability standards and protocols (HL7, X12, IHE, EDI, SSIS, etc.)
Strong in Data management, governance, stewardship, quality, privacy and protection with large-scale data or project management and oversight experience
Experience in SQL/Python/Spark/Scala technology, data visualization tools (Tableau), notions of Entity-Relationship Databases and data models (star schema, data vault, etc)
Integration of Business Rules Engines, AI / ML models & Business Process Management into applications
Understand OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities and working experience in developing secure codes

Title: Azendian - Senior Data Engineer Role (Enable Data Access & U...
Description:
We are looking for dynamic data professionals who will be leading data engineering team, designing and delivering high quality data products - data warehouse, data marts, data lake and data hubs - on cloud or on-premises system environments for the clients in government, public and private sectors.
We invite suitable individuals with strong data management experience to join our information management team. We are rapidly growing and are expanding into numerous domains and industries. If you are looking to expand your capabilities in data and analytics and looking for a team with a vision, come join us!
Senior Data Engineer Responsibilities:
Key responsibilities
Leads, Designs, Builds and supports the data pipeline and all associated Software Engineering infrastructure tasks
Liaising with clients, technical architects, data architects, data scientists and BI Analysts to gather
the requirements
Analysing the data requirements and preparing functional and non-functional specification for
data products.
Designing and Developing data pipeline using either ETL/ELT approach to load or synchronise
data in near real time or batch mode.
Lead ETL Development team and ensure the standards and qualities of ETL development and
deliverables.
Conceptualising and generating the data pipeline that allows big data to be accessed and
analysed.
Preparing Test Plans and conducting Unit Testing, SIT, UAT and Performance Testing
Designing and Implementing deployment approaches and methods to roll-out the system
changes
Remaining up to date with industry standards and technological advancements that will improve
the quality of data products.
He / she must be:
A keen learner with a minimum bachelor’s degree in Computer Science and related fields
A self-starter with an analytical approach to problem solving.
A client-centric, outcome and quality focussed team player.
Competent in written and oral business and technical communication in English.
In term of experience, the successful candidate should have:
At least 3 to 4 years of end-to-end data warehouse, data lake and big data implementation experience
7 or more years’ experience in similar industry area
Mandatory Skills – Informatica ETL Tools , SSIS, SQL Skills, SQL Server , Azure Data Factory, Data
Warehouse, ETL Framework
Value Added Skills - DataStage, Attunity, Hadoop Ecosystem, Data APIs, Unstructured Data and Data
Modelling, BI Tools – Power BI, Microstrategy, Qliksense and Tableau, SAS.
Managed and coached a team to achieve project objectives
Ability to lead teams under pressure with demonstrated experience in project management
Understand solution requirements and design, develop, build and operationalise solutions
Enjoy problem solving in different domains and industries.
Love working with high energy and competent teams

Title: Senior Application Architect
Description:
We are looking for a Senior Applications Architect with enterprise background on system integration. You will be required to work on a project to revamp and redesign an existing legacy application to new technologies and modern technology stack. Knowledge and experience on multiple frameworks, platforms, and long term integration projects will be crucial in driving the strategy into success.
Senior Application Architect
Have you ever thought of working with a company that provides a wide range of services and has robust product engagements with enterprise businesses? Our client has a wide range of support and products within cloud computing, unified communications, collaboration, Big Data, Internet of things, and Artificial Intelligence. This company has a presence all over the globe and will give you a valuable portfolio to add under your belt.
We are looking for a Senior Applications Architect with enterprise background on system integration. You will be required to work on a project to revamp and redesign an existing legacy application to new technologies and modern technology stack. Knowledge and experience on multiple frameworks, platforms, and long term integration projects will be crucial in driving the strategy into success.
The role of a Senior Application Architect will be located in Singapore, are looking to looking for a challenge your experience and work with a client that values their employees? If yes, this is your chance!
What will you be doing?
Guide the design of technical software from the business requirements by leveraging design methods, patterns, and best practices
Analyze the client's information technology requirements, translate these needs into system and architecture requirements to ensure architecture design is met accordingly.
Take ownership of the application architecture until it is going live, vendor's management, escalate issues, delivery, and find relevant people to fix problems when required.
Work with a complex system integration project, legacy, to migrate old application to modern stack.
What are we looking for?
10 years of Java/J2EE application architecture experience.
Professional experience in designing, project integration, application development and leadership at the enterprise level.
Influential people communication skills that, and comfortable with senior employees, management, stakeholders, and customers.
Familiar with tools, technologies, and servers like; Java, J2EE, JBoss, WebLogic server, BPMS/BRMS, Oracle, GitHub, Jenkins, Azure/AWS (Amazon web services), CICD (continuous integration and continuous delivery), Spring and Hibernate.
Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or related disciplines
Good understanding of functional and non-functional requirements, technology risks and limitations
Huxley, a trading division of SThree Pte Limited (Registration Number: 200720126E | SThree Pte Limited Licence Number 16S8216 | Huxley Licence Number 53132076J)
Award winner of:
International Recruitment Company of the Year by Recruitment International 2016
Best Client Services by Asia Recruitment Awards 2017
Best Overseas Operation by Global Recruiters 2017
Highly Commended for Best Large Recruitment Business 2017

Title: Senior Solution Architect - Digital Transformation
Description:
Senior Solution Architect – Digital Transformation
A global leading organization is looking for a talented and passionate Solution Architect to work on their journey of digital transformation with emerging technologies and enable on business opportunities.
Key Responsibilities:
Subject matter experience in solutioning for Digital Transformation across technologies (AI; Big Data, Web, Mobile, etc.)
Single point of contact and accountability to work with key/senior business stakeholders for delivery of transformation.
Provides consultancy and acts as an in-depth technology expert and trusted advisor and partner on any technology related initiatives and innovations across all markets in the region.
Owns the end-to-end process of the solutions and ensuring all business goals and objectives are met.
Promote and driving insights and a data driven decision making business culture, business efficiency and customer engagement transformation.
Relationship management and ensure continuously engages and communicates with clients to stay proactive on changes and alignment to business needs.
Identifies opportunities for sharing and re-use of digital assets across the region.
Proven track record in leadership, relationship management and in maintaining high quality solutions and lowering costs.
Key requirements:
10+ years of experience in management, solutioning, high-level consulting position at enterprise levels on Digital Transformation.
In-depth understanding of variety of technologies: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Big Data, web, mobile, email, social media, SEO/SEM, gamification for customer engagement, etc.
Experience in digital transformation using AI, Big data driven solutions for enterprise-level projects/programs.
Strong analytical skills and digital technical expertise to drive team members and educate business users on changes.
Ability to perform impact analysis and business case for adoption of new technologies with strong back up data analysis.
Able to design and articulate strategic goals and define the right tactics to support a strategy.
Proven track records in enterprise-level projects/programs roll out for digital transformation initiatives.
PRINCE2 or Project Management Institute (PMI) or equivalent qualification will be added advantage.
Experience in Healthcare, Medical Device, Biotechnology, Digital health, Pharmaceutical related industry will be added advantage.
Please send your resume in WORD format by clicking the apply button below or contact Helen Nguyen on +65 6701 1519 for a confidential discussion. Please note that only short-listed candidates will be contacted. CEI Reg. Number R1660747 (Nguyen Ngoc Thanh Hien).

Title: SVP / VP, Intelligent Banking Development Lead (C2MA), Group...
Description:
Business Function

Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.

Job Purpose
The selected candidate is required to take on the Senior Development Lead role and manage the technical analysis, engineering and development work related to CBG Customer Management and Analytics.
Manage end-to-end delivery of C2MA initiative across countries
Provide efforts sizing and Technical design specifications for Business & Tech initiatives
Work with business and tech stakeholders on alignment of requirements and delivery to ensure reuse
Align to architecture principles and standards & make sure the deliverables and solutions adhere to organization design principles.
Provide strong governance controls over the technology environment, in accordance with established standards and procedures.
Key Accountabilities
Lead/support new projects as development lead capacity with an essential understanding of Big Data, Customer Management and Analytic.
Understand and worked in AGILE development environment
Champion the change management to on-board initiatives and application across consumer banking group into Big Data Platform by providing leadership, guidance and full ownership of success on-boarding
Able to propose approaches to improve quality of process models, data ingestion best practices, metadata definition and data modelling
Able to understand business requirements and business value to be delivered
Creation, maintenance and delivery of trainings.
Timely delivery of projects and initiatives assigned.

Responsibilities
As the Senior Development Lead, you are responsible to understand the requirements, analyse the functional delivery, define specification, designing, writing, debugging and testing
Ability to provide insights and guidance to the team with best software development practices and techniques.
Ability to direct the team from concept, solution design to testing and implementation.
Adhere to corporate standards, policies and architectural direction in developing the software
Participate in requirements analysis and be able to make risk assessments of larger system design and come up with alternative designs.
Research in new 3rd party/open source libraries, new technologies.
Evaluate and communicate technical risk and ensure applications are delivered against a schedule with the highest quality.
As part of the team, you will be called upon to design, estimate, develop, test and document the delivery over the entire lifecycle from inception to implementation.
Working with architect, data modeller, business analyst and End Users within organization.
Lead the team in the Development of Test Scenarios / Test Plan and to perform technical / functional testing to ensure requirements are well met
Lead the team in conducting performance load testing and regression testing.
Lead the team to perform analysis and troubleshooting of defects
Responsible for mentoring junior developers.
Requirements
In-depth industry and academic knowledge with minimum 10 years proven experience in process analysis and design, preferably in financial services/banking related to Big Data and Analytic
Minimum 7 years’ hands on experience using modelling tools for process and end-to-end solution design. Data Management knowledge and experience required.
Development experience Apache Spark, Apache Hadoop.
Development experience using Apache Airflow.
Development experience using Kafka.
Development experience in Java and Python
Proficient in tools such as Jira, Git, Bitbucket, Jenkins, Nexus
Strong understanding of Distributed systems.
Knowledge and experience on how data and application are integrated with business processes, policies and regulations
Highly organized and structured thinking and ability to understand and synthesize unstructured information.
Proven ability and experience in data transformation tool training, internal awareness and cross team engagements.
Desired experience on Big Data or similar Data Warehouse tool.
Strong communication and presentation skills.
Analytical thinking and ability to understand and synthesize unstructured information
Knowledge around business process modelling, Information Systems analysis and design, enterprise technology and data modelling
Knowledge in risk and governance concepts.
Strong team player with management skills
Apply Now

We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and the professional advantages of a dynamic environment that supports your development and recognises your achievements.

Title: VP, Senior Big Data Engineer, Group Consumer Banking and Big...
Description:
Business Function

Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.

Senior BigData Engineer

As a Senior Data Engineer you'll be a Machine Learning and Data Engineering Specialist and help us discover the information hidden in vast amounts of data. You'll help us make smarter decisions to deliver even better products and apply data mining techniques and statistical analysis to build high quality prediction systems integrated with our products.

Responsibilities
Design and implement key components for highly scalable, distributed data collection and analysis system built for handling petabytes of data in the cloud.
Move architecture and implementation through the development pipeline, from research to deployment
Work with architects from other divisions contributing to this analytics system and mentor team members on best practices in backend infrastructure and distributed computing topics.
Analyze source data and data flows, working with structured and unstructured data.
Manipulate high-volume, high-dimensionality data from varying sources to highlight patterns, anomalies, relationships and trends
Analyze and visualize diverse sources of data, interpret results in the business context and report results clearly and concisely.
Apply data mining, NLP, and machine learning (both supervised and unsupervised) to improve relevance and personalization algorithms.
Work side-by-side with product managers, software engineers, and designers in designing experiments and minimum viable products.
Build and optimize classifiers using machine learning techniques and enhance data collection procedures that is relevant for building analytic systems.
Discover data sources, get access to them, import them, clean them up, and make them “model-ready”. You need to be willing and able to do your own ETL.
Create and refine features from the underlying data. You’ll enjoy developing just enough subject matter expertise to have an intuition about what features might make your model perform better, and then you’ll lather, rinse and repeat.
Run regular A/B tests, gather data, perform statistical analysis, draw conclusions on the impact of your optimizations and communicate results to peers and leaders.

Requirements
10+ years of Experience in one or more areas of big data and machine learning
The ability to work with loosely defined requirements and exercise your analytical skills to clarify questions, share your approach and build/test elegant solutions in weekly sprint/release cycles.
Development experience in Java/Scala and pride in producing clean, maintainable code
Practical experience in clustering high dimensionality data using a variety of approaches
Real world experience in solving business problems by deploying one or more machine learning techniques
Experience creating pipelines to analyze data, extracted features and updated models in production.

Title: Manager, Solutions Architects - SEA
Description:
Mission
The SA Manager will lead a team of exceptional Solution Architects. As you will help to spearhead our expansion into SEA, the ideal candidate is one who has built and led technical pre-sales teams in the Enterprise Software, Big Data/Analytics or Data Science and is looking to move to the next stage in their career by building a team in hyper growth mode and with a 1:1 sales to pre-sales ratio. The right candidate has a strong track record of partnering with the sales organisation to close revenue and has the right approach to coaching new sales and pre-sales teams to work effectively together. You will actively guide and get involved to enhance your teams effectiveness, be an expert at creating and articulating complex, business value focused solutions, supporting complex sales cycles, and building relationships with key stakeholders in large corporations.
Outcomes
Own and drive hiring and building the SA team, rapidly scaling the designated field engineering segment org without sacrificing quality
Be able to build a high performing collaborative culture within a hyper growth team. To embody and enable Databrick’s customer obsessed, teamwork and diversity culture
Support increase ROI of SA involvement in sales cycles by 2-3x over 18 months
Enable a solution/value-based selling field-engineering organization
Display a thorough understanding of business needs and revenue potential for accounts in the assigned region
Competencies
Experience in senior presales roles and in developing, managing and building a team of successful Big Data, Cloud, or SaaS professionals
Has experience scaling field and/or technical teams from scratch to 7+ - ideally at hyper-growth speed
Must be knowledgeable in and passionate about Spark, Big Data, and Cloud technologies and/or Data Science
Great at instituting processes for technical field members to drive efficiency and effectiveness
Bachelor's Degree in STEM subject, MSc or PhD highly desirable
Technical background either in Data Engineering / Database technologies or Data Science
About Databricks
Databricks is the data and AI company. Founded by the original creators of Apache Spark™, Delta Lake and MLflow, Databricks simplifies data and AI so data teams can collaborate and innovate faster. More than five thousand organizations worldwide —including Shell, Conde Nast and Regeneron — rely on Databricks as a unified platform for massive-scale data engineering, collaborative data science, full-lifecycle machine learning and business analytics. Venture-backed and headquartered in San Francisco (with offices around the globe) Databricks is on a mission to help data teams solve the world’s toughest problems.

Title: Business Intelligence Architect
ED, Head of Consumer Banking Branch & Self Service Banking T...
Description:
Business Function

Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.
Overview


DBS is the World’s Best Digital Bank. We are on a mission to reimagine banking to make it a seamless and invisible part of our everyday lives. We put digital priorities at the heart of banking, designing and creating products and services to help our customers. Digital innovation pervades every part of the bank, from our consumer banking to corporate banking arm. With a strong culture of innovation, experimenting with new technology and collaboration with the Fintech community, we aim to simplify banking so we can help others Live More, Bank Less.

At DBS, we see ourselves as a 28,000 people start up, leveraging start-up thinking while relying on the latest innovation to design and develop technology solutions for our customers and people.
Based in Singapore, you’ll be leveraging the latest technology to develop mission critical applications from scratch. You’ll design, develop, test and deploy new applications as part of the strategic transformation programme, using Agile, cloud technologies, micro-services, Big Data, machine learning and other OSS technologies.
Responsibilities

The role is responsible for growing and leading the highly skilled multi-disciplined engineering that deliver technology solution for the Consumer Banking business regionally. You will be facing off to the Head of Branches and Self Service Banking for Consumer Banking and be responsible for driving technology solutions that is used to guide DBS’s transformation towards a Digital and Intelligent Bank.
The core practice is one of Agile, leveraging cloud native architecture pattern using Test Driven Development (TDD), continuous integration/continuous delivery, in an on-premise or public-cloud environment, where everything is automated. The core design principle is one that promotes API-everything.

Role
Partner with the Head of Consumer Banking Branches & Self Service Banking to drive the strategy, architecture and delivery of the platform
Manage the technology teams (100+ people based in Singapore and Hyderabad) responsible for developing and supporting inhouse or vendor solutions
Drive technical vision and vision, technology stack selection and R&D of emerging technologies as it relates to branch and self service banking
Strong technical competence including prior experience in developing mission critical applications from scratch Drive the technology architecture transformation to support the evolution towards digital and intelligent bank. This includes green field buildout of mission critical applications using modern technology patterns and practices
Be a trusted advisor to the business to identify opportunities for technology leverage in business development
Change champion to drive culture, mindset and skillset transformation in technology; Drive the reskilling of the incumbents and recruitment of modern skills resources as needed
Manage team of technology resources comprising project managers, business analysts, architects, and developers to deliver related technology build-out
Manage the service availability of technology platforms to meet required service level agreements
Drive continuous improvements in the reliability, availability and performance for all technology platforms and ensuring superior client experience
Ensure that applications are architected with supportability, availability, security, cost effectiveness and good client experience in mind
Manage the budget and financials for all technology deliveries
Partner with internal or external technology solution providers to provide estimates, develop overall implementation solution/application plan, and serve as a lead as required, to implement the installation, customization, and integration efforts
Survey market landscape for solution/application insights, direction, vendors and methods
Manage software vendor relationship as necessary
Requirements
At least 15+ years of relevant application development experience of mission critical systems from scratch
Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or Electrical Engineering
Significant and solid software engineering experience using Agile/Lean methodology, Test Driven Development and familiarity with distributed computing, cloud native architecture patterns, containers, machine learning/big data, native capabilities of any public clouds (Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure or Google Cloud Platform)
Experience in leveraging continuous integration and robust build/test automation, with a preference for cross platform stacks and containerization (Git, Maven, Jenkins, Sonar, Docker, Cloud Foundry, etc.)
Create mission critical applications from scratch and building up new development team for a brand-new mission
Driven major changes in technology architecture and technology team culture
A technologist’s technologist - able to lead high performance technology teams by example
Experience in the financial industry is NOT required

Title: Tableau Senior Technical Engineer
Description:
Job: Technology
Primary Location: ASEAN & South Asia-Singapore-Singapore
Schedule: Full-time
Employee Status: Permanent
Posting Date: 04/May/2020
Unposting Date: Ongoing
About Standard Chartered
We are a leading international bank focused on helping people and companies prosper across Asia, Africa and the Middle East.


To us, good performance is about much more than turning a profit. It's about showing how you embody our valued behaviours - do the right thing, better together and never settle - as well as our brand promise, Here for good.


We're committed to promoting equality in the workplace and creating an inclusive and flexible culture - one where everyone can realise their full potential and make a positive contribution to our organisation. This in turn helps us to provide better support to our broad client base.


The Role Responsibilities


The BI Senior technical Engineer is expected to have Advanced knowledge and experience with Tableau software (Desktop Pro, Server, Interactor) and role balanced, with a strong understanding of Tableau architecture and administration. In this role, the individual must hold good market knowledge of other BI Tools in the space of data discovery, data modelling, data visualisation, predictive analytics, prescriptive & descriptive analytics. In this role, the individual should be a team player and should have sound knowledge of new technologies in the BI space. This is a multitasking role and the individual is expected to support multiple BI BOW and operations teams as well as a large and diverse Tableau user community. This role will report into the Head of BI Reporting.

Mandatory Technical / Functional Skills :
Advanced knowledge and experience with Tableau software (Desktop Pro, Server, Interactor) and role balanced, with a strong understanding
Knowledge of Tableau System Administration (includes site creation, server maintenance/Upgrades/patches).
Knowledge of Change management including software, hardware upgrades, patches
Capable of Monitoring/building workbooks to manage server activity/usage statistics to identify possible performance issues/enhancements
Sound Knowledge in Performance tuning / Server management of tableau server environment (clustering, Load balancing).
Strong Knowledge in BI tools including ETL, Data Warehousing, other BI tools.
Manage and support migration of objects (dimensions, measures, hierarchies, reports, workbooks, dashboards), from development to production environments
Sound knowledge of SCB processes to traverse through licensing, new node procurements, License procurements etc
Manage BOW and coordinate prioritization activities across technical and non-technical teams
Develop and document standards/best practices for development and administration of the Tableau platform
Provide status to the senior management team and keep stakeholders apprised of key project activities
Partner with business to design tableau KPI scorecards & dashboards
Provide appropriate training and support to business users on the use of Tableau interactive web reports, and Tableau Desktop
Challenge teams to deliver appropriate quality standards in all work products
Work with senior management in supporting the BI visualisation roadmap for the Bank
Maintain enterprise data management processes, governance, standards and compliance
Our Ideal Candidate

Skills /Abilities and Knowledge
Advanced knowledge and experience with Tableau software (Desktop Pro, Server, Interactor), with a strong understanding of Tableau architecture and administration.
Experience as Tableau administrator, developing in, configuring and administering Tableau Server.
Strong development skills in Tableau and data analytics and visualizations
Strong Knowledge in BI tools including ETL, Data Warehousing, other BI tools.
Experience in Tableau scripting (TABCMD and TABADMIN).
Ability to architect a stable Tableau solution guaranteed for high operational availability.
Experience working with Relational Databases (SQL Server - required, Oracle).
Expertise in Tableau platform sizing, troubleshooting, tuning & disaster recovery.
Good knowledge of Tableau Metadata tables
Education
Bachelor’s degree in information technology or related field, or equivalent experience
Related Work Experience
Experience in BI role working specifically with Business Community producing analytical reports/dashboards, predictive analytics, ROI calculations demonstrating value of BI
Experience in using the below components in Tableau
Tableau Server Management Module
Tableau Power Tools
Tableau Desktop Professional
Experience working in a mixed methodology environment (Agile / waterfall / hybrid)
Experience working with a blended onsite and offshore staffing model and leading offshore team members on the technical deliverables
Certifications
Tableau Certified Server Administrator
Tableau Certified Desktop Professional
Tableau Certified Analyst
Apply now to join the Bank for those with big career ambitions.


To view information on our benefits including our flexible working please visit our career pages.

Title: Reporting and Analytics Project Manager - WM COO
Description:
Your role

Are you passionate about delivering real value to Wealth Management APAC by implementing sophisticated Data Warehousing, reporting and analytics tools? Do you have an interest in understanding the front-to-back view from data sourcing to reporting? We're looking for someone like you to help us with the following:

analyze and design solutions for data distribution
collaborate closely with our end clients, data architects and developers
track, document and report progress to various Project Managers
further enhance our self-servicing data and reporting functionality
support ongoing enhancements for data quality and reporting automation
Your team

You’ll be working in the Reporting and Analytics Change-the-Bank team in Hong Kong or Singapore. Our team focuses on supporting the global analytical platforms for WM APAC and driving self-service capabilities for our end users.

We are a team of open minded and highly motivated professionals who care about our clients and delivering high quality solutions. We are accountable for what we do and say and take control in how we do things.

We have strong collaboration with our global counterparts to ensure successful delivery across the global platforms and supporting our local stakeholders

Your expertise

You have:
Strong skills in Business Intelligence Tools like Business Objects (must have), Microstrategy, Tableau or similar
Strong skills in Database Systems like DB2, Oracle or similar
Sufficient background in technology, information management, relational database design and development, business intelligence, data mining or statistics
Able to work independently managing multiple tasks and projects within tight timelines. An understanding of project management methodologies is desirable.
A strong desire to learn new tools and solve problems in innovative ways
Ability to lead requirements analysis and elaborate end to end solution designs
Financial services industry is a highly desired
Experience in implementing data quality techniques is a plus
Skills in Big Data & Advanced Analytical technologies as a plus
You are:
Creative and able to challenge the status quo to create efficiencies and support the use of innovative technologies in the distribution of management information
A strong project leader able to drive solutions forward and influence others
Quickly adaptable to changing market situations, technology and business needs (you’re smart and flexible)
Personable and thrive in a collaborative team environment
Able to work with teams across multiple locations
EFC-UBS
#LI-HK
Your colleagues

About us

Expert advice. Wealth management. Investment banking. Asset management. Retail banking in Switzerland. And all the support functions. That's what we do. And we do it for private and institutional clients as well as corporations around the world.

We are about 60,000 employees in all major financial centers, in more than 50 countries. Do you want to be one of us?

Join us

We're a truly global, collaborative and friendly group of people. Having a diverse, inclusive and respectful workplace is important to us. And we support your career development, internal mobility and work-life balance. If this sounds interesting, apply now.

Contact Details

UBS Recruiting Singapore

Disclaimer / Policy Statements

UBS is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We respect and seek to empower each individual and support the diverse cultures, perspectives, skills and experiences within our workforce.

Title: Senior Application Architect
Description:
We are looking for a Senior Applications Architect with enterprise background on system integration. You will be required to work on a project to revamp and redesign an existing legacy application to new technologies and modern technology stack. Knowledge and experience on multiple frameworks, platforms, and long term integration projects will be crucial in driving the strategy into success.
Senior Application Architect
Have you ever thought of working with a company that provides a wide range of services and has robust product engagements with enterprise businesses? Our client has a wide range of support and products within cloud computing, unified communications, collaboration, Big Data, Internet of things, and Artificial Intelligence. This company has a presence all over the globe and will give you a valuable portfolio to add under your belt.
We are looking for a Senior Applications Architect with enterprise background on system integration. You will be required to work on a project to revamp and redesign an existing legacy application to new technologies and modern technology stack. Knowledge and experience on multiple frameworks, platforms, and long term integration projects will be crucial in driving the strategy into success.
The role of a Senior Application Architect will be located in Singapore, are looking to looking for a challenge your experience and work with a client that values their employees? If yes, this is your chance!
What will you be doing?
Guide the design of technical software from the business requirements by leveraging design methods, patterns, and best practices
Analyze the client's information technology requirements, translate these needs into system and architecture requirements to ensure architecture design is met accordingly.
Take ownership of the application architecture until it is going live, vendor's management, escalate issues, delivery, and find relevant people to fix problems when required.
Work with a complex system integration project, legacy, to migrate old application to modern stack.
What are we looking for?
10 years of Java/J2EE application architecture experience.
Professional experience in designing, project integration, application development and leadership at the enterprise level.
Influential people communication skills that, and comfortable with senior employees, management, stakeholders, and customers.
Familiar with tools, technologies, and servers like; Java, J2EE, JBoss, WebLogic server, BPMS/BRMS, Oracle, GitHub, Jenkins, Azure/AWS (Amazon web services), CICD (continuous integration and continuous delivery), Spring and Hibernate.
Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or related disciplines
Good understanding of functional and non-functional requirements, technology risks and limitations

Title: SQL Database Administrator
Description:
Job detailed description
As a L2 resource of his /her team, he /she:
· Takes up technical tasks and also manages delegation for technical issues within the team,
· animates the team to encourage collaboration and sharing of best practices,
· supports new technologies and leverages them to provide consistency of service across streams,
· proposes service improvements for all Big Data services supported throughout the organization,
· documents, reviews, maintains and shares relevant technical information within the team
· provides technical knowledge, supports services both proactively and reactively to maintain the availability and reliability of system infrastructure in accordance to the SLA,
· works in line with policies based on LEAN-CA-CIB best practices,
· Actively engages during any high severity issue and drives for issue resolution.
· reviews technology changes to identify potential risks,
As an experienced professional in Database tehnology, he/she:
· supports his/her team during diagnosis when technical issues rise in his/her scope of expertise,
· is aware of the global IT structure so that he/she anticipates interrelationships within the organization,
· engages with technical peer, Development team, Service managers, Architect and project teams on technology roadmap and projects,
· facilitates transformation projects and suggest future directions for new areas of improvement and change,
· guarantees the production readiness and license to operate of new projects and solutions
· is available and able to drive technically, any complex or high severity incidents that occur within the scope of their role,
· actively engages to understand new technologies and technology trends and reviews them with a view to incorporating them into CACIB operations,
· actively assists in identifying the most technical skilled candidates for open roles,
· technically coach and develop partner resources to improve quality and productivity,
Job specific environment and/or organization
· Fluent English - written and spoken
· French language is desirable
· Working hours will primarily match Europe business hours
· On-call support will be expected on a rotational basis
Candidate profile
Mandatory track record
· Manage SQL Server databases
· Configure and maintain database servers and processes
· Monitor system's health and performance
· Ensure high levels of performance, availability, sustainability and security
· Analyze, solve, and correct issues in real time
· Provide suggestions for solutions
· Refine and automate regular processes, track issues, and document changes
· Assist developers with query tuning and schema refinement
· Provide 24x7 support for critical production systems
· Perform scheduled maintenance and support release deployment activities after hours
· experience of High Availability (HA) and Disaster Recovery (DR) options for SQL Server
· Experience in Database migration/upgrade from Lower version to higher versions.
· Expertise in writing Power shell scripts, Perl/Python scripts and debugging existing scripts.
· Ability to quickly learn new technologies and enable/train other analysts
· Ability to work independently as well as in a team environment on moderate to highly complex issues
· High technical aptitude and demonstrated progression of technical skills - continuous improvement
· Ability to automate the SQL installations and configurations hosted on windows & Linux servers
· Network and system administration experience, preferably in large-scale data center environments
· Excellent communication, interpersonal and logical skills
· Customer service oriented and a strong team player
· Ability to work under pressure and a commitment to solving issues
· French language proficiency would be seen as an advantage
Primary Responsibilities
· Manage Production Server Environment
· Creation and Maintenance of Database Instances
· 24x7 Production support including scheduled and emergency night and weekend work.
· Install, configuring, applying patches to SQL server
· OS level activities related to database tasks which is including SPN creation user mgmt
· Knowledge in Replication, Log Shipping, Clustering
· Schema Object, Partition Management, Index Management
· Follow the IT service management guideline while working with tools like ‘remedy, HPSC, etc
· Document best practices and maintain the knowledge base
· Knowledge in DTS,SSIS,SSRS ,SSAS components.
Job Types: Full-time, Contract

Title: Senior Asean GSI Partner Manager
Description:
The right person will possess 10-15+ years of sales, business development and/or partner management experience with 5+ years of experience working.
Strong verbal and written communications skills are a must, as well as the ability to work effectively across internal and external organizations
The right person will possess 10-15+ years of sales, business development and/or partner management experience with 5+ years of experience working with GSIIs.
Strong verbal and written communications skills are a must, as well as the ability to work effectively across internal and external organizations
Proven experience driving Cloud centric and Digital revenue through indirect Channels via structured programs
Deep experience at or have worked with Global System Integrators (GSIs)
Proven ability to identify and support 3rd party offering development
Experience working across different sales, business development and technical teams, bringing together a cross functional teams to deliver results
Demonstrated experience working across the ASEAN region
Consistently exceeds quota and key performance metrics
Demonstrated ability to engage and influence C-level executives
Strong presentation skills and the ability to articulate complex concepts to cross functional audiences

Would you like to be part of a team that is redefining the IT industry? Amazon Web Services is leading the next paradigm shift in computing and is looking for world class candidates to manage a Global Systems Integrator & Influencer [GSII] partner across ASEAN. Do you have the business knowledge and industry expertise necessary to position Amazon as the preferred technology platform of the future?

As Global Systems Integrator & Influencer Partner Manager, you will have the exciting opportunity to deliver on our strategy to build mind share and adoption of Amazon’s web services across AWS’s most strategic customers and community members.

You will drive sales execution with the partner by teaming with AWS field leaders across ASEAN. This requires driving executive and field relationships with the Partner's Client Account Leaders, Managing Directors, customers and the AWS leadership team. You will be responsible for driving top line revenue growth via partner led and supported opportunities and you will work with the partner to source new engagements within select strategic clients. You will work with the global and regional Partner Managers, Business Development and broader Amazon Partner Network (APN) Segment teams. The ideal candidate will possess both a strong sales background that enables them to engage at the CXO level, as well as a solid technical sales background that empowers them to easily interact with technical leaders within and outside of AWS. He/she should also have a demonstrated ability to think strategically about business, product, and technical challenges, with the ability to build and convey compelling value propositions.

Roles & Responsibilities:
Work with AWS Area sales managers and Solution Architects to define and execute joint sales and GTM initiatives in collaboration with key partner stakeholders.
Co-sell and drive joint targeted sales engagements between and AWS Area sales teams to generate new pipeline and close sales opportunities.
Engage the partner's operating groups, offering and cross-functional organizations, and clients to shape offering development and incremental revenue opportunities for AWS.
Build targeted go to market plans to improve AWS penetration in specific industry verticals and work with internal teams to develop Account Based Marketing (ABM) initiatives such as joint prospecting to generate demand.
Serve as a key member of in helping to define and deliver the joint offerings, repeatable assets such as prototypes and Pilots.
Set ASEAN Partner Plan and ensure it is in line with the AWS strategic direction.
Execute the Partner Plan working with internal stakeholders (e.g. marketing, BD, service teams, legal, support, etc.).
Understand the technical requirements of the specific partner and work closely with the internal development team to guide the direction of our product offerings.

#AWSSINGAPORE

Master’s Degree in business or related field
Visible IT Industry thought leadership on relevant topics related to Digital Transformation and enterprise IT adoption

Broad based technology experience including cloud computing, big data and analytics, networking, security, storage and ongoing infrastructure management

Amazon is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Amazon is an equal opportunity employer, and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age, or other legally protected status.

Title: AVP / Senior Associate, Senior Software Engineer, Group Cons...

Business Function
Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.

Job responsibilities:
Write high quality, maintainable production code in an engineering-oriented environment
Work closely with Product team and Technical Architect to translate both business and non-functional requirements into scalable solutions, ensure compliance with platform architecture standards and patterns
Take end to end technical ownership of developed features being fully accountable for the efficient and high quality implementation based on relevant technology
Take responsibility for feature-focused unit and system testing, enforce test-driven development
Contribute to performance and load testing procedures and issue remediation
Contribute to coding standards and best practices for the team, participate in code reviews
Enforce best practices in code quality, security and release/deployment process to achieve near-zero production incidents
Participate in and drive Proof-of-concepts to assess new solutions and technologies
Work within an agile environment as part of a cross-functional collaborative team distributed across locations
Job requirements:
Minimum 7-10 years of experience in software engineering designing and building highly scalable applications
Hands-on in full stack development
Possesses deep understanding on Cloud Native applications
Highly comfortable with Java Spring Framework / Spring Cloud
Familiar with front-end frameworks (React or Angular)
Experienced with building applications using AWS Services
Data modelling experience in both Relational and NoSQL databases
Good understanding of infrastructure components like webservers, appservers, plugins, connection pooling, SLB, firewalls etc.
Good understanding of OAuth 2.0 / SAML 2.0 protocols
Experience writing unit, functional, load and end-to-end tests
Experience in designing and coding scalable microservices
Experience working with JIRA, Confluence, Jenkins & Bitbucket
Strong working knowledge of SDLC and Agile development methodologies
Strong knowledge and experience in automation, containerisation and orchestration using tools such as Mesos, Chef, Ansible, Docker, Jenkins, SonarQube, Kubernetes etc.
Ability to effectively prioritize and execute tasks in a high-pressure, fast paced agile environment
Degree/Diploma in Computer Science, Engineering or related field
Ability to work along with team distributed across geographies

Title: Digital Architect
Payments and Insurance Principle Solutions Architect
Description:
10+ years of experience working in Payments and Insurance organizations and implementing solutions in a regulated environment in APAC.
Very strong experience in the Payments and Insurance industry and associated regulatory environment, expert knowledge of the supporting applications and infrastructure
7+ years of experience as an architect, designing and implementing large-scale solutions in the Payments and Insurance industry.
Deep experience with financial services-related applications such as core banking and payments systems, trading platforms, financial information systems, big data analytics, etc.
Solid understanding of virtualization and/or cloud computing technologies
Strong verbal and written communications skills are a must, as well as the ability to work effectively across internal and external organizations and virtual teams.
A talent for being able to influence and build mindshare convincingly with any audience. Confident and experienced in public speaking to large audiences.
The ability to handle complex relationships and work in a team environment is a key requirement.
Ability to work across the core ASEAN region (Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Vietnam, Indonesia, Philippines).

Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the pioneer and recognized leader in Cloud Computing. Our web services provide a platform for IT infrastructure in-the-cloud that is used by hundreds of thousands of developers and businesses around the world. These customers range from start-ups to leading web companies to Global 500 companies in financial services, pharmaceuticals, and technology. An important function within the AWS organization is the Digital Customers team, which is an ASEAN function centered around developing of new Digital Native Businesses and Independent Software Vendors.

AWS Digital Customers team is looking for an experienced and motivated technologist from the Payments and Insurance industries with a passion for creating strategies, best practices and solving complex business challenges for our Payments and Insurance customers.

The ideal candidate must be self-motivated with a deep understanding of cloud, use cases, architectures, workflow and ecosystem. The ability to connect technology with measurable business value is critical to a Solutions Architect. You should also have a demonstrated ability to think strategically about business, products, and technical challenges.

Successful candidates will also possess:
The deep technical skill in software architecture and cloud computing
Customer facing skills ideally gained within a partner/consulting organization and have demonstrated the ability to think strategically about business, product, and technical challenges.

Strong understanding of AWS and/or technology as a service (IaaS, SaaS, PaaS) would be preferred but not required

Amazon is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Amazon is an equal opportunity employer, and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age, or other legally protected status.

Title: SQL Database Administrator
Description:
Position - SQL Database Administrator
Job summary
He/She will be a technical L2 resource for MSSQL database services in CA-CIB. As such, he/she will provide support for all production support activities within the Database team in Singapore. He/She is accountable for the overall health and stability of the technical solutions within his scope. He/She has to effectively work with technical peers such as architects, peer experts and project teams on technology road maps and projects. He/She will work with L3/Service Manager to gain control over the scope of technical activities, develop best practices and gain knowledge over all aspects of support.

The Database team operates the RUN activities and delivers projects for its infrastructure scope covering all Database associated technologies.
Job detailed description
As a L2 resource of his /her team, he /she:
Takes up technical tasks and also manages delegation for technical issues within the team,
animates the team to encourage collaboration and sharing of best practices,
supports new technologies and leverages them to provide consistency of service across streams,
proposes service improvements for all Big Data services supported throughout the organization,
documents, reviews, maintains and shares relevant technical information within the team
provides technical knowledge, supports services both proactively and reactively to maintain the availability and reliability of system infrastructure in accordance to the SLA,
works in line with policies based on LEAN-CA-CIB best practices,
Actively engages during any high severity issue and drives for issue resolution.
reviews technology changes to identify potential risks,
As an experienced professional in Database tehnology, he/she:
supports his/her team during diagnosis when technical issues rise in his/her scope of expertise,
is aware of the global IT structure so that he/she anticipates interrelationships within the organization,
engages with technical peer, Development team, Service managers, Architect and project teams on technology roadmap and projects,
facilitates transformation projects and suggest future directions for new areas of improvement and change,
guarantees the production readiness and license to operate of new projects and solutions
is available and able to drive technically, any complex or high severity incidents that occur within the scope of their role,
actively engages to understand new technologies and technology trends and reviews them with a view to incorporating them into CACIB operations,
actively assists in identifying the most technical skilled candidates for open roles,
technically coach and develop partner resources to improve quality and productivity,
Job specific environment and/or organization

Fluent English - written and spoken
French language is desirable
Working hours will primarily match Europe business hours
On-call support will be expected on a rotational basis
Candidate profile
Mandatory track record
Manage SQL Server databases
Configure and maintain database servers and processes
Monitor system's health and performance
Ensure high levels of performance, availability, sustainability and security
Analyze, solve, and correct issues in real time
Provide suggestions for solutions
Refine and automate regular processes, track issues, and document changes
Assist developers with query tuning and schema refinement
Provide 24x7 support for critical production systems
Perform scheduled maintenance and support release deployment activities after hours
experience of High Availability (HA) and Disaster Recovery (DR) options for SQL Server
Experience in Database migration/upgrade from Lower version to higher versions.
Expertise in writing Power shell scripts, Perl/Python scripts and debugging existing scripts.
Ability to quickly learn new technologies and enable/train other analysts
Ability to work independently as well as in a team environment on moderate to highly complex issues
High technical aptitude and demonstrated progression of technical skills - continuous improvement
Ability to automate the SQL installations and configurations hosted on windows & Linux servers
Network and system administration experience, preferably in large-scale data center environments
Excellent communication, interpersonal and logical skills
Customer service oriented and a strong team player
Ability to work under pressure and a commitment to solving issues
French language proficiency would be seen as an advantage
Primary Responsibilities

Manage Production Server Environment
Creation and Maintenance of Database Instances
24x7 Production support including scheduled and emergency night and weekend work.
Install, configuring, applying patches to SQL server
OS level activities related to database tasks which is including SPN creation user mgmt
Knowledge in Replication, Log Shipping, Clustering
Schema Object, Partition Management, Index Management
Follow the IT service management guideline while working with tools like 'remedy, HPSC, etc
Document best practices and maintain the knowledge base
Knowledge in DTS,SSIS,SSRS ,SSAS components.
